Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT LED TV!!
Reviews.Author: Insane
Reviews.Content: this is an awesome TV to have at the kids room, the image quality is AWESOME (exactly what you would expect from a Samsung product)I Highly recommend you get some HDMI cables (if youre looking to optimize the picture quality when using this product with an XBOX 360, or any other game console)PS if you're looking to buy a Television of this dimension (26 inches) then get the 720p as there is no major difference between 720p and 1080p in this size.. now if youre looking to get a television from 35 inches or bigger now I would higly recommend you look at 1080 as the picture quality is highly noticeable..

Reviews.Title: Budget TV with Nice features and slim design view from front
Reviews.Author: Shikha
Reviews.Content: Hi, This 32 inch Samsung TV will meet the expectations of people who don't want to shell out much money as compared to other RCA and some cheap brands which sold out on your local stores but want good looking and nice features in their TV. It has nice contrast, color and brightness combinations. Movie and dynamic modes will meet most peoples viewing criteria. Sound is also good enough and can be used in bed room without any home theater system or external speakers. Remote control has back lit feature to be use in dark room. Thickness as you see in pics is not bothering as it can hardly be seen from front and gives you the impression of slim TV. While connecting it to laptop you will require to adjust the screen resolution of your laptop to accommodate the complete picture on TV screen. It does not have VGA port which is merely require as most of the laptops sold in last 3-4 years does have HDMI port which can be used for laptop connection (I used amazon brand hdmi cable 5-6 dollar cost which is best in its class). Personally if you are looking something for your living room then you should go with at least 40 inch tv but for bed room this 32 inch size is perfect pick. Black contrast is good enough when you set the level at low. Gamma settings can be changed and cool/warm settings are also present to increase/decrease the amount of blue/red shade. After using it for few days i realized that 1080P TV is not at all required for that extra money as you will hardly be able to recognize any difference between full definition Vs 720p definition. Completely satisfied with my purchase and didn't have any complaint about it. I got what i was expecting in 350 bucks backed by amazon's trust of new unopened product. it would be nice if amazon can sell any low budget TV stand also so that people can buy them together (in range of 20-30 bucks) as you wont prefer spending 100 bucks just on stand for the TV worth cost of 350$. Highly recommended, go for it, you wont regret on your purchase. Also its very light weight to pick easily from one room to another whenever you want to shift it to other place (of course this is not daily moving item)Pros:satisfied with picture qualityNice set of features in low budget tvlook wise it is same as other costly slim TVsBack lit remote is usefullightweightUSB port to play images, mp3 and movies (most of the formats are supported as per samsung website manual)easy firmware upgrade via USB flash driveCons:Missing VGA portLittle thick in the back but hardly mattersUniversal remote feature is missing to control all other appliances related to TVShould have been sold with TV stand as bundle packageWill definitely recommend to friends and family-Shikha

Reviews.Title: Good picture, a little thick
Reviews.Author: DDD
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung UN26EH4000 and the Sharp LC26SV490 at the same to compare the pictures.  Since the Samsung costs $40 more than the Sharp, I figured I would pay the extra if the Samsung's better.  The Samsung's pictures are so much better than the Sharp.  The Samsung is 720p and the Sharp is 1080p, but the Samsung is more clearer and more define.  The only disappointing thing about the Samsung is it's much thicker than the Sharp, 3.6" vs. 2", and it's protruding out of the wall too much.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED 26" TV
Reviews.Author: ljoy nichols
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. The image quality is exceptional (just what you'd expect from a Samsung product) I have come to trust Samsung products. They never disappoint. The size is fine for a small room and 720p is fine, no difference between the 1080p for this size TV.This was purchased for a 650 sq. ft. condo and also had to fit into an old style 30" square opening in an oak bookcase/wall unit. Absolutely a breeze to set up. A few screws to put the stand together, connect the cable, plug it in and you're ready to go.I had read that the sound quality was very poor but that didn't turn out to be true. Only drawback is there is no audio jack to attach external speakers but it really isn't a big problem. For the price this is a terrific TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for kitchen
Reviews.Author: David Noller
Reviews.Content: I have this TV in a kitchen (large kitchen) and, so far, I am very happy with it, although I had to fiddle with the settings and connections a lot to get it set up the way I wanted it.  The picture, now that I have it set right, is excellent (especially for HD signals, but also decent for standard TV) and the sound is surprisingly good as well.  As other reviewers have said, it has a lot of configuration options for a "low end" LED TV as well.Hook upI have it connected to the (Comcast) Cable with a splitter. One side of the splitter goes into the TV Antenna input and I used this side to be able to watch "local" channels in the clear as HD.  Here I am able to get network, PBS and a few other channels (maybe 30 or so).  The rest are scrambled, so not usable on this leg.  The other leg off the splitter is fed into a DTV box and then into a Panasonic DVR that I am really just using as a switch.  I run component cables out of this side into the component connections on the TV and on this side I can see all the "standard" channels, but not HD, standard (4x3) signal.  I tried it first with Composite connections (Component has 3 cables for video, Composite only has 1) and the picture is better with the Component cable connection.Given that setup, I use the Source button on the remote to flip it back and forth (I watch network on HD, everything else on the Std side).The TV tuner, obviously, is able to receive and decode the local channels from Comcast "in the clear", including HD.This configuration irritates my wife (two remotes!), but I really like being able to watch sports, etc, in HD without having the more expensive DVR from Comcast to decode HBO, etc (we have that downstairs on our main TV).If the TV had two Antenna inputs I could have skipped the DVR I am using as a switch, that would have been easier.Video SettingsIt took me a while to get the settings the way I like them (Marvin's post helped a lot), but here is how I have the video set which, for me, looks great:Mode:  StandardBacklight: 20Contrast: 95Brightness: 45Sharpness: 40Color:  53Tint:  50/50Advanced Settings:Color Space: NativeWhite Balance:Gamma:  0Dynamic Contrast: MediumBlack Tone: DarkerFlesh Tone: 0Motion Lighting: OffPicture Options:Color Tone: Warm1Size:  Screen Fit/Zoom1 (HD/Std)Digital Noise Filter: AutoHDMI Black Level: n/aFilm Mode: AutoLED Motion Plus: OffAudio Settings:Mode: Standard (must be Std to have access to Equalizer)Equalizer:  Balance:  0  100hz: +2  300hz:  +5  1Khz:  0  3Khz:  +1  10Khz:  +2SRS TruSurround HD: OnAuto Volume:  OnI had some trouble deciding what "size" setting I liked best for the std (4x3) signal.  The 4x3 setting is the most clear, but the picture does not fill the screen (you have black borders at least on the side, and maybe on top depending on what perspective is being used for the broadcast).  16x9 fills the screen nicely, but the people gain a few lbs as they get wider.  Zoom1 does the best job of filling the screen without changing the perspective, but the top and bottom get chopped off a bit.  I am using Zoom 1 (and I move it a bit if I am missing something due to it being chopped at the bottom, e.g. a news crawler).  For HD, Screen Fit is definitely best.One final note, I tried the LED motion out with sports, but the picture looks a lot "duller" to me with that on and I don't see any problem with sports, etc, with it off.A second final note (is that allowed?), I was worried about 720P vs 1080P, but I think the picture (especially HD) is great, I don't see how it really could be improved much with 1080P (would probably make more of a difference on a larger TV).

Reviews.Title: Love is TV
Reviews.Author: GranJan "Bargain Hunter"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV at a great price.  Sharp clear picture, great sound with options for movie, standard, clear voice and music.  Extreemly easy set up. It literally took minutes to attach stand, hook up cable and DVD player.  Great picture right out of the box, tho you can tweek it to your preferences.  I bought the 32" and am very glad that I did not move up to a larger size.  In my 15x15 room this is plenty big without becoming a focal point and interfering with the decor.The only thing that would have made it better is if it came with a swivel stand; other than that, it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: OneFederalist
Reviews.Content: Here I was stranded with a Sony piece of junk. For that, I shelled out big bucks a couple years ago sold over by the internal Blu-Ray player and Wi-Fi connectivity only to have it finally die on me last week. All those fancy-smancy Sony adds and paying pretty much top dollar for a 32", and I figured I'd at least get 5 years out of it. Nope. Blu Ray dies ~5 months ago. OK, I can live with that. Just buy an external one. This week, the channel and sound are not able to be changed unless I rebooted (i.e., unplugged and plugged) the TV. So I decide to give Samsung a try knowing how much I've always thought their computer monitors always struck me as better than others. After all, I'm just looking for a good image. I can live without all the other bells & whistles. Boy, if this thing can stand the test of time I won't go back. The picture quality is fantastic. It's got a Dynamic, Movie, and Standard Mode. The modes actually seem to work for what they imply (unlike my Sony piece of junk). The sound is very good too. It's got Standard, Movie, Clear Voice, and Music. Those too actually work like the names imply (unlike my Sony piece of junk). The features are enough to live with. You can stick a USB in it and watch pics and movies. There's no built in wi-fi, but who needs it with most Blu-Ray players? With Blu-Ray players providing the connectivity and online features (e.g., Netflix, Amazon Video, etc.), I figured why bother spending the extra for the same stuff. The 720p clarity is perfect on a TV this size. I see no difference between it and 1080p, but that's just me. The price was right for an LED. So overall, I'm very satisfied and recommend this TV, unlike my Sony piece of junk..

Reviews.Title: Good price, gorgeous panel
Reviews.Author: Darik Horn
Reviews.Content: The panel on the Samsung UN26EH4000 is gorgeous. The black level is just as good as an older plasma TV.  It is probably the best display quality that you can get in an inexpensive 26 inch TV.I deducted one star because:* The joystick is awkward and flimsy. This TV does not have power or volume buttons, which is a design mistake.* The TV is very deep and has internal space for better speakers, but the sound quality is just as bad as any other small TV.* The side recess for the two HDMI ports is not deep enough, so the cables stick out unless you tie them back.This TV has some nice features that are worth noting:* The built-in speakers are super loud. You could put this TV in a noisy place like a bar or cafeteria and still hear it.* The AVI and MKV video support is actually compatible with standard "scene" releases. (eg: Handbrake.fr files.)* The built-in video player has a setting to automatically repeat a USB playlist, so you could use this TV as a cheap "barker" in a waiting room or retail space.* It is super light weight. I can easily lift it with one hand. Any VESA mount would be strong enough to hold this TV.* The ATSC decoder can play audio-only OTA channels.I got this TV from Amazon with the 1011 firmware. The latest firmware version currently posted to the Samsung web site is 1008.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Scott Gurley
Reviews.Content: I'm really happy with this TV but I'm disappointed that it doesn't have a headphone jack.  I frequently watch TV after my family has gone to sleep so it's a handy feature to have on a TV. I checked the specs for this model on several websites and at least two of them indicated that it had this feature (not Amazon).  Does anyone know if I can buy an adaptor?  I ordered one but I don't think it will work.  I'd rather not purchase a wireless pair of headphones to replace the new ones I already own.

Reviews.Title: BUY IT! You'll love it!!!
Reviews.Author: lakesidegent "Bob"
Reviews.Content: I'm just an average guy who wanted a tv for the bedroom. I had a 19" but it was way to small. I'm NOT going to go into all the mumbo-jumbo with what it has and what it should have. I really don't care. I read all the specs and did my homework and based my decision on that. I went to several stores and looked at all the 32" tvs they had out and this one had the best picture. It seem that it was brighter and softer than the other brands. I have a larger Samsung in the living room and it's great! I feel like Samsung is where Sony use to be.  I also have some other Samsung products. The only knock I can give this tv is that Samsung's manual is really BAD.  It is on one large piece of paper folded into sections. I went to the website and downloaded the manual. Much easier to read. One knock was about the stand. Yes, it's plastic. You MUST install six (6) screws in order for it to be secure. The assembly instructions are a bit weak. Make sure you put the two screws on the bottom of the base. This tv is great when the boss wants to watch Lifetime and you want to watch ESPN!!!  Happy viewing!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4000 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: DARRYL PIKE
Reviews.Content: Was purchased for a bedroom.  I was able to set up using the HDMI cable to a AT&T; Uverse home network with little difficulty and added a DVD  and VCR player.  I did have a problem with the remote for it wasn't working with the channel selection button.  I contacted the Samsung support and after going through the recommended  tests, it was decided there was a glitch in the remote and new one is being sent.  Excellent support service.  Very satisfied with the product and delivery through Amazon. My Uverse remote worked with a simple setup precedure.

Reviews.Title: Happy With My Purchase
Reviews.Author: S. Colascione
Reviews.Content: Just received this 32" Samsung TV the other day and after setting it up we are very happy with it. This replaced a wall mounted 19"CRT that was purchased back in 2003 so this is our first flat screen model. This has proven to be a perfect size for our 12 by 26 foot master bedroom  and it is wall mounted as well. I read in some previous reviews that the TV stand was unstable but I have not found that to be a problem, There are 8 screws that have to be attached in all and once they are the TV is stable, Also some have said that the sound was a little on the poor side, Again not so,  Plenty of volume and we have a large bedroom. I would say that the instructions were not bad but they were printed on a fold out piece of paper with small print and a booklet would have been better but no big deal. In setting this TV up there are a number of different options for you to choose from to tailor it to your liking.  The remote has many buttons but once you see where the main ones are it's fine. The picture is bright and clear and I like the small frame around the screen. On the bottom right side under the screen there is a button that you can control the TV functions if you misplace the remote control, (it's sort of like a joy stick button) where you hold it different ways to commend different functions like channel up & down main menu or on and off of TV. The TV's that you see on the showroom floor are set to (Showroom View) That means that they set at a brighter setting because of all the lighting in the store but when first setting up this TV in your home it will ask you if you want to set it at showroom settings or home setting and I would suggest you set it to the home setting because it will use less energy and the TV will last longer. All in all, were very happy with our purchase of this TV and we got a good price from Amazon with no sales tax and free delivery, What more could we ask for.  PS, I did a lot of reviewing of TV's on line and this proved to be the best in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv! (26")
Reviews.Author: Rose Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I got this 26" to replace 32" lcd in bedroom and was a happy purchase.  This is my 3rd led tv from Amazon some much larger and has always been a good experience. (With the larger ones they even them brought them in and set them up.)Took some fiddling around with the adjustments, but pic is very good on most channels and excellent on many- that with no HD box, just cable upstairs.  To my joy it picks up 11 "air" channels !!!  So if the cable goes out I'm good. "TIP"  during set-up put the scan for channels on "auto" and it will include the free over the air ones & it keeps them separate from the cable channels. Sound: In standard mode you can choose surround sound and there is an equalizer to tweek- that vastly improves the sound. The quick "Tools" button on the remote is to great to access menu items you use frequently.And even tho my upstairs cable did not pull in HD with the 32" lcd (Panasonic)- this tv pulls in many HD channels with Dolby.  Very light- 9-10 lbs.  I like the HDMI ports on the right side - easy access if using for games. Would have liked a 3rd hdmi port.  Good TV.-------------After having this TV a while I like it even better- great TV.  And even tho I have a 40" in the LR- love watching this 26" in the BR- Great picture.  (On a side note... the really good remote I got with this TV works with the Samsung I bought 3 yrs ago - different models.  This smaller and backlit remote is so good I got another for the older Samsung.) I use a Roku with this set to access Netflix and the picture comes in very clear.

Reviews.Title: Supurb picture
Reviews.Author: J. Keeling
Reviews.Content: OK, the remote has to many small buttons. There are only two HDMI inputs and the sound system is only acceptable. Samsung omitted some bells and whistles to keep the retail price down, but they did not take any short cuts on picture quality. This 32" 720P/60hz TV has a superb picture. This LED stuff works. Colors are vivid but not overpowering and the black is black. I easily hooked the passable audio to my wave radio and instantly cured the audio deficiency. Yes, I recommend this TV to anyone wanting a 32" basic TV. You can easily spend more money, but you must look carefully to find a TV set with a better picture. Hay, spend more money if you can. Just buy your TV from amazon. You won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: NY Don
Reviews.Content: 4 Stars because of perfect picture quality, Super energy saver... The price is well worth it.This TV has a headphone jack in actuality although it doesn't say so. It is the back hole at the back.

Reviews.Title: Good value, great picture
Reviews.Author: johnevans3
Reviews.Content: I received the Samsung UN32EH4000 on time and in good working condition, meaning it fired right up and was ready for programming after connections were made.  The channel search is a little slow but I expected that given I had another Samsung TV and a Samsung HDTV tuner.  I tweaked the picture a little and it looks great.  I was a little disappointed that the TV is a little thicker (about 3.5") than I would have liked but I realize the advantages in this model when compared to the "thin" LCD sets.  It is back lit rather than edge lit so no light splotches around the edges on dark scenes and the deeper packaging allows for physical space to have decent speakers and good sound.  No need for a sound bar like many of the thin models I examined prior to my decision to get this one.  All in all, this is just what I needed to fit my 30" wide cabinet in the motor home.  I have no width latitude and this fits perfectly.  I just wish they made a 30" for the TV in the bedroom and I would be set to go.

Reviews.Title: Cheap stand
Reviews.Author: Nab
Reviews.Content: I was happy to get this product at the lowest price around, but soon found out why. The stand that it sits on is made of thin plastic, and a small tab broke off within 2 weeks so that it was unusable. Now I have to figure out a way to fix it or replace it.

Reviews.Title: I love my new TV!
Reviews.Author: jbee
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic tv for the bedroom or kitchen. We ordered the TV for the Connectshare capability. It's so easy to upload movies and tv shows to a usb drive, plug it in and start the video. We didn't require any setup for Connectshare and it plays our mkv's seamlessly- much better than the PS3! Connectshare is absolutely fantastic, I would highly recommend any Samsung TV that has it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for a Small Bedroom
Reviews.Author: B. Besse
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for a 12'x11' bedroom, and it looks great.  We installed it very easy on a flat panel mount.  The base appears decently built, although it was only on there for a day to try it out.  The picture looks great, and the memory stick video option works exactly as described.  You simply load any avi movie on the stick, and it automatically gives you a plug and play menu that plays the videos perfectly.  The tv is actually in a room for cardio, and it works great with exercise videos on USB.It has been a month, and it is a very good tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Luci Fiorini
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a nice size TV for a bedroom and was really happy with the previous samsung TV's.  I searched for a specific 32" LED  samsung at all of the big stores for at least a $100 more then what Amazon listed it for. I took a risk on getting TV's via mail, but was really surprised.  Came quickly and with no problems.  Hooked it up the same day.  Will order another larger size on Amazon next time.  Highly satisfied! Great picture as well!

Reviews.Title: Samsung delivers again
Reviews.Author: Bob S
Reviews.Content: I've been a fan of Samsung TV's & other electronics for years. I replaced my still perfectly working 15 yr old 26 " CRT TV with this LED. I couldn't be happier. Easy to set up (including wall mount) and the sound & picture are awesome. I never realized what I was missing in TV until I went HD with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Got what we were looking for..
Reviews.Author: Colorado marine
Reviews.Content: My wife and I needed a new tv for the bedroom that wouldn't take up much space... We have had it now for 6 months and it's just perfect.. Great picture quality.. Good sound... Great price. I'll probably buy another for the guest room. You can never go wrong with Samsung

Reviews.Title: There is audio out!!!!
Reviews.Author: Craig Solow "Photo Junkie"
Reviews.Content: After much contemplation and reviews I purchased this TV. My biggest "issue" was I wanted audio OUT. All the goggling I did said optical audio out or bust. Well I want everyone to know. First this TV is GREAT! Second, out of the whole manual, tons of googl'ing, there was no real info on audio out non optical. There was a picture in the manual that showed there was a way to audio out to RCA plugs to a "older" home stereo. So I tried a few things and here is the answer!! YES there is audio out, one optical, and the other jack look like a weird cable jack from another planet with a hole. Well that hole is all you need. That is a standard ipod size stereo jack (it does not look like it). I bought a cable that had one side a stereo 3.5mm jack (standard ipod ear bud connector), and the other side your standard RCA male plug. Boom it works! The only downside is when you change the volume on the TV it does not lower/raise your external audio. I guess the theory is, you turn off your internal speakers (there is an option for that), and use your stereo. I use both for movies. I hope this solves a few mysteries out there as there was NO data for this. Buy this model, it is Great!Amazon sells a few flavors of this cable, but here is one to put in the Amazon search field (it is less than $2.00):RiteAV - 3.5mm to Stereo RCA Male Cable - 6 ft.

Reviews.Title: Great 26" TV for your desk/kitchen table.
Reviews.Author: Marvin
Reviews.Content: Samsung UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)This is a near-perfect television set for your desk or kitchen. Prior to purchasing this 26" LED-LCD TV, I have tried out the PlayStation 3D display. Little did I know that I found the glare and backlight bleeding of the PS3Display to be overpowering. The 24" display is also a little on the small side as well.- Glare- No TV remote- On the Small side, with minimal inputsAfter returning the PS3Display for this Samsung TV, I am relieved to find the lack of the glossy/reflective screen. Colors still pop and the extra 2" make a huge difference next to my Dell U2410 monitor. My primary use of this TV is for casual gaming (PS3/Xbox 360) and the occasional Netflix binge. To my surprise, this TV does in fact support 1080p (1920x1080 resolution)! There are more even options available within the menu screen: [16:9], [Zoom1], [Zoom2], [Wide Fit], [4:3], and *[Screen Fit], as well as:+ 4:3 Support+ 16:9 Support (720p, and 1080p)!+ HDMI ports x2+ Component port+ Coax (cable tv)+ USB multimedia support+ Audio-Out port (great for headphones for late night gaming)+ TV Remote- Slight blacklight bleeding- Moderate speakers (no complaints for TV use)So far I have had the Samsung TV for four days now and have watched nearly all four seasons of Psych via Netflix. I am surprised of the sheer quality of the screen (TN panel) next to my Dell Monitor (IPS panel). On the negative side, there is slight backlight bleeding and visible white glare/contrast from looking far sides of the screen. I also had to propped the TV with some books to align it with my monitor.After some calibration (comparing it to my Dell U2410 monitor and '08 Unibody MacBook), I have found the optimal settings for regular TV use (e.g. Netflix (streaming from my PS3)):Menu:Mode: [Movie]Backlight: [20]Contrast: [95]Brightness: [45]Sharpness: [20]Color: [50]Advance Settings:Color Space: [Native]Gamma: [0]Dynamic Contrast: [0]Black Tone: [0]Flesh Tone: [0]Picture Options:Color Tone: *[Warm2] (<- Optimal for TV/Movie watching vs [Standard] -> optimal gaming setting)Size: *[Screen Fit] (<- Optimal for 1080p setting)Digital Noise Filter: [Auto]HDMI Black Level: [Normal] ([Low] is simply too dark)Film Mode: [Auto]LED Motion Plus: [Off]*Little tip: For gaming, the main adjustments you need to adjust is to change your Color Tone from [Warm2] to [Standard]. Your colors will be brighter and will pop much more.Overall, this Samsung TV set is perfect for my corner desk. It's not too large sitting next to my Dell monitor and it's the perfect addition to relax after a long day with some TV. The only recommendations I would recommend to Samsung is add tilt/height adjustment, use an IPS panel to improve picture quality, and perhaps an extra inch wouldn't hurt (e.g. 26" -> 27"). That alone would give this great TV that extra star!

Reviews.Title: Acceptable for the money
Reviews.Author: Walter L. Martinez
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 40" 3D Samsung TV from Amazon about 7 months ago and think it is amazing. So I purchased this 32" Samsung TV and think that it is good for a bedroom and best viewed directly from in front of the TV and not at an angle. This is a quality unit, but the 32" Panasonic TV that I purchased from Amazon over a year ago has a better picture.

Reviews.Title: Beware the high gloss screen
Reviews.Author: JN
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV to replace a smaller Sharp used in our kitchen. After adjusting the picture trying to eliminate the ghosts in the dark areas, we realized that the high gloss screen was reflecting the scene out the window. Placing the 2 side by side when turned off, the matte finish of the Sharp reflected only a shadow while the Samsung was like a dark-colored mirror.We had recently bought the similar 32" Samsung for the bedroom, and without a facing window it works fine.I described the problem to Samsung Support and was told all Samsung TVs have high gloss screens. According to cnet, most manufacturers now use high gloss screens which produce a picture with a lot of showroom "pop". Buyers should be careful tho to consider the ambient light which the screen will face.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great Design and Price
Reviews.Author: J.R.
Reviews.Content: I've had my new Samsung for two weeks now and I love it. The picture quality is better than just about all other sets in this price range. Colors are accurate and bright, and the most impressive thing to me would have be the deep black levels. I am an avid sports fan, and I haven't had any motion issues at all. So if you are a sports fan and were concerned about 60hz, it isn't a problem. The sound quality is OK to above average which is fine. I wasn't expecting state of the art sound from a small TV. Voices are clear, and the volume is more than plentiful and can get quite loud if you wish. That's all that matters to most of us. Another selling point for me was the ample amount of inputs for the price. Two HDMI most of all. Component/Composite Video, Digital Audio Out, USB and the 3.5mm Headphone/External speaker Audio Output. I couldn't ask for more than that when we're talking about a set that isn't meant to be your main TV. I would like to mention, if you're connecting headphones to the Audio Out, they're not controlled by the TV volume. It's decent sound nothing great. I also ordered Mediabridge Ultra Series HDMI Cable to hook up my HD cable box. I Highly recommend Mediabridge cables if you're looking for a great price and build quality. Lastly, I would like to comment on the design. This doesn't look like it is under 300 dollars. It is very modern looking and the bezel is thin so it's all screen. The stand is very basic and nothing special, but again, for what it is, it gets the job done and looks good. The backlit remote is a nice touch and is helpful when you're watching some TV before you sleep. It is rather dim unless you're in total darkness, tho. I've seen a few complaining about thickness. Not an issue for me, but I don't have it wall mounted. So I can't comment on that. In closing, you get what you pay for. I couldn't be happier choosing Samsung and LED.A few folks have been sharing calibration settings, so I figured it wouldn't hurt to post some myself. After all, if we don't like them, all we have to do is hit the rest button. I do recommend these tho to get the most out of your new TV. Nothing looks oversaturated or artificial, and you don't have to be bothered by halos from oversharpening. Night and day difference. These settings are from Ty Pendlebury.Picture menuMode: MovieBacklight: 20Contrast: 76Brightness: 43Sharpness: 0Color: 57Tint: G50/R50Picture Options menuColor Tone: Warm2Size: 16:9Digital Noise Filter: OffHDMI Black Level: Low [Greyed out most likely]Film Mode: Off [Greyed out]LED Motion Plus: OffAdvanced Settings menuGamma: 0Black Tone: OffFlesh Tone: 0Motion Lighting: Off [Greyed out]Black Enhancer: OffWhite balance submenu:R-Offset: 27G-Offset: 28B-Offset: 27R-Gain: 14G-Gain: 28B-Gain: 19

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: bps
Reviews.Content: Received a Samsung UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV.  Unit arrived in good condition.  Speaker sound is low and picture is sometimes wavy in a 3-inch square in the center of the screen. Would rate this product 3.5 on scale of 1-5.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and sound!
Reviews.Author: RAF
Reviews.Content: This LED HDTV offers a crisp, vibrant picture regardless of the setting.  High speed motion clarity varies with the setting. But, you should be able to find a setting for your personal viewing habits.  Play with the various alternative picture settings to meet the requirements of your particular viewing room and viewing habits.  Also, do not be scared away by the lack of HDMI slots (there are only two).  I've installed a multiple HDMI switch for use with individually connected devices that works well.  One slot is connected to the digital cable box.  The other is connected to the HDMI hub with four slots and works beautifully.  All in all, an excellent value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV to replace an older Sony TV.  It fit in the same space and was LED.  The TV installation was quite easy.  We only use the TV for over the air broadcast using an external antenna.  Using an antenna we are able to get 9 channels - all with perfert reception.  I installed a sound bar using the external speaker support provided by the TV.  We are very pleased with the TV and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a 26" TV.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture and audio
Reviews.Author: Christopher Vargas "durandal"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV after getting burned by a 32" LED set from a bargain-basement manufacturer. The picture was OK on the cheap set, but the audio was horrible. I tried any number of solutions to improve the audio, finally settling on a kludgey setup with computer speakers, a mini-mixer, and lots of cables.Luckily, the bargain-basement set died, and I picked up this Samsung set. What a shock--if you don't cheap out on your purchase, you get a better product. The sound is head and shoulders better than the cheapo set. It's no replacement for a good set of speakers, but at least it gets loud without sounding too tinny.The video quality on the whole is good. I was disappointed to see some vignetting on solid white images, like ones that you find in some commercials, but since I'm usually skipping commercials it's usually not noticeable.The set makes a funny chime when you turn it on and off. I'm sure there's a setting to disable that; I just haven't bothered to go through the menus to find it.720p? For the viewing distance I have the set at, and for these tired old eyes, why pay for 1080p if I don't have to?Very good set, fair price, happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung Deal
Reviews.Author: Country Girl
Reviews.Content: Delivered very quickly, no damage, all appropriate parts in shipment, quick & extremely easy set up, easy to understand menus, excellent picture, and very reasonable price for a Samsung............Enough Said!  I Love It!

Reviews.Title: Happy to be in the 21st century!
Reviews.Author: bounce
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV! Wow, can't believe it has taken me sooooo long to get this task done. As for the Samsung, so far, so good. That's the news for now-Oh, let me say this about you, Amazon. Your company is wonderful to work with. Items arrive on time, "no grief" return policy, very user friendly customer service employees... Keep up the terrific service and business affairs in 2013!Happy New Years, allPaula

Reviews.Title: Not Impressed.......
Reviews.Author: Mr. Howell
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 26" version of this for my 87 year-old mother after having purchased a 43" plasma Samsung myself last year. I was really impressed with the quality of Samsung on the 43", especially after having had a bad experience before that with a POS Emerson. Well, after seeing this Samsung, I'm wondering if Samsung isn't going downhill? That, or they just don't put the same quality into their smaller TVs as they do in the larger ones (Unfortunately, my mother didn't want a large TV)- This seems more like something you'd get in Wallyworld for a hundred and thirty-five clams. The pedestal is cheap and rather flimsy; The picture is no better than what you'd find on a much cheaper 26" [No, I'm not comparing it to my 43" plasma TV- which is spectacular.]; The sound is rather poor; and the viewing options/adjustments are rather limited. My mother is quite happy with it; and hopefully it will last much longer than a TV from Wallyworld.....but had I seen this TV before purchasing it, I would not have bought it- I would have just taken my chances with a cheaper one, because this set doesn't seem to offer anything that they don't- except, perhaps longevity....hopefully.On the positive side: I do like the fact that there is an actual tactile on/off switch on the set itself (My 43 incher doesn't even have that); and the remote works nice, and is shaped better than older incarnations of the same, which were shaped in such a way that they'd slide off of a perfectly horizontal surface!And as other reviewers have noticed, this appears to be an LCD TV, not an LED, as it is advertised to be. I'd send it back if it were mine....but my mother is satisfied to keep it.

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, great picture
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Hsu
Reviews.Content: My analog Sony Trinitron bit the dust on 10/31 and it was more than 10 years old. All I wanted was a TV that had a sharp picture, easy setup and could fit in the small space I had.  I looked at Consumer Reports and they recommended Samsung for LCD and LED TVs.  This 26" Samsung 720p 60Hz LED HDTV UN26EH4000 fit my requirements.  I was able to set it up by myself and hook it to my DVD player and digital converter box without any problems. The sound is great and the picture looks very sharp and clear. Plus it's an Energy Star product, which made me feel good about the purchase. With the smaller screen size, you can't tell any difference between the 720p vs. 1080p display. The refresh rate is 60 Hz, but with the smaller screen size, you can't see a blur. I know that Samsung has Smart TVs for the larger sizes, so I will definitely consider all those fancy features in the future for a larger Samsung when the need arises, but for now, this 26" Samsung is perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: A few flaws but an amazing picture.
Reviews.Author: Sharonf
Reviews.Content: This TV has an amazing picture right out of the box.It also has a few cons which is why I am giving it four stars instead of five.The stand is flimsy and in my opinion defective. The TV is slightly tilted up which is irritating to me. I took the stand apart and looked at it again and in my case at least the problem seems to be that when you slide the stand onto the back of the TV the slots on the stand do not line up correctly with the slots on the TV. The stand won't slide on smoothly without slightly tilting it and of course that makes the TV tilt a little.The documentation is poor. There is a user manual but it is on a folded piece of paper and the printing is so small you practically need a magnifying glass to read it. The instructions are also not very clear in many areas. I prefer the manual I received with my Toshiba TVs. They are magazine size manuals with very detailed instructions and illustrations.The clock doesn't work when set to auto. I finally had to go in and set the time manually.The firmware on the Samsung site for this TV is an older version than the firmware the TV came with! If you are used to updating the firmware on products, you need to check the dates carefully.That being said I would still buy this TV again because of the superb picture....and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very good tv, with very good sound and picture, at a great price.  Perfect for the bedroom.  Our only complaint is that we should have bought the 32"!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4000 32" 720p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: I have found this television to be excellent.  It was out of the box and playing in less than 10 minutes .... The stand is stable, the color superb, the picture vibrant and sharp, the sound is very adequate, for the medium sized room in which I watch this TV.  Viewed from the side I find the picture more pale and less dynamic than front viewing, which is my reason for 4 stars rather than 5.  I reviewed many HDTVs via Amazon consumer reviews and found this particular model to be the best rated for functionality and at this price, I agree that is a very good choice.  I'm not a techie so cannot get into the complicated reviews that I found very helpful, but if you take time to read those written by more technically astute reviewers, you will be sufficiently advised on a good value.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG UN32EH4000 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: E IN MARYLAND
Reviews.Content: Great TV,  thin, lightweight, great picture, great sound. This 32inch SAMSUNG is a replacement for an old (TUBE) 28" TV. The TV arrived in perfect condition, I had my cable provider switch out my cable box so I could use this HD TV to its full benefit. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Happy with TV
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung 26 inch because of the small apartment I live in.  The TV has great sound and picture quality.  The TV arrived within a couple of days after ordering and only required the installation of the stand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, no problem installing it.
Reviews.Author: roxane21
Reviews.Content: It took me 5 minutes to have it up and running.Screen Quality seems excellent to me.Sound is clear.

Reviews.Title: One of the best 'Low-End' Tv's you'll find.
Reviews.Author: Ian Potere
Reviews.Content: The first thing to keep in mind is that: There is tons of stuff out there better than this TV.  But for the price, you get your moneys worth any some.  The screen is beautiful.  Thus far, I have only had my TV for a few days, and in that time, I have only been able to game... but that gaming has been some of the best I've ever had.Some of my bias may come from upgrading from a 20'ish samsung from ~6 years ago. But regardless, this 32 not has a slick and beautiful screen, but it's almost like the apple of tvs... the tv itself looks slick and beautiful.  I walk into my TV and just can't but help but smile.Do yourself a favor buy this.  If you are looking for a 32 inch low end tv.  This is well worth the small extra money compared to the unreliable Cobys or Dynexs out there.And on the same step, if you are looking at the 32, avoid the UN32EH5000.  The 1080 is just a waste of money.  The only time you need to worry about that is 40+... an argument can be made for a 37 inch mattering, but... when it comes to this TV.  the 1080 vs the 720 is NO WHERE NEAR WORTH $100 some.Save that cash for your next upgrade, or for some directTV action.  You'll like be glad of your decision.

Reviews.Title: Good Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: GB
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased for my daughter for her bedroom. Picture quality is the best, easy to hook up and hand unit is user friendly.You can't go wrong with this model. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R. Brant, MD
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace an older Samsung LCD TV of the same size.  This TV is brighter and the picture looks great out of the box with very little adjustments needed.  The blacks are inky black and the whites are very bright and accurate.  Great contrast and color fidelity.My only minor complaints are: 1) Sound is OK but a little tinny and lacking much base; typical for down-firing speakers in this size TV.  Not terrible for the application where I'm using the TV (on my desk next to my PC monitor).  2) The base is fixed; no swivel or tilt.  Again, not a big problem for the location I'm using the TV.Have had this TV for about three months now and so far no problems.  I also use it as a second monitor for my PC at times.  Very easy to switch back and forth from cable box input to PC input.Another advantage is the low power consumption and nearly no heat output.Very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: It is a great value!
Reviews.Author: Mom of two boys
Reviews.Content: This TV has amazing picture quality!  We are using it in our kitchen and the sound is great over the noise of the dishwasher.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality.
Reviews.Author: L. Pukin
Reviews.Content: Very good quality and the angle of view is pretty decent. Small bezel size means that this TV will fit into a constrained space without sacrificing on the screen size. This was very important to me as I had a small size in a kitchen cabinet. The sound is very robust for a TV this size.

Reviews.Title: Good view from any angle
Reviews.Author: K. Spencer "Angelica's mom"
Reviews.Content: Really pleasantly surprised by how good the picture was on this tv. We purchased the 26" size. We needed a tv that could be viewed while you were sitting on the floor, the couch, or standing up. This one delivers, the picture is just as good on all three levels.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the kitchen!
Reviews.Author: J. Staker "scioto celiac"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at this TV for several months waiting on the price to come down. Got a great deal on Thanksgiving Day. Fits perfect in my kitchen and the picture is awesome! It was very easy to set up.  Have had no problems with it!

Reviews.Title: Totally Pleased with Purchase
Reviews.Author: Rosalind Raleigh
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my office to replace a no-name, much more expensive TV that died within 5 years.  Learned my lesson to stay with reputable brands.  My first choice usually is Sony.  Pleased with large screen Sony in LR but disappointed with a recent purchase for my bedroom.  Very satisfied with my 7 yr old Samsung in kitchen (on constantly).  After reading many, many reviews, comparing different brands, decided to stay with Samsung.  Delighted with purchase.  For a 26 inch screen, 720p is comparible to 1080 in larger sizes.  LED picture is terrific, true colors, sharp contrast.  Customer Service walked me through the connecting process.  Important to know I can easily speak with a person in the US if I have a problem.  With a few easy adjustments, fantastic picture & more than adequate sound.  Those who are disappointed with picture and/or sound obviously have not tried the adjustments.  Shipment was fast!

Reviews.Title: Oustanding 26 Inch hdtv
Reviews.Author: gone_west
Reviews.Content: I needed a 26 inch tv to fit onto a small platform that sits next to my treadmill. Several expert reviews considered this set to be the best television for this size display, a no frills, no needless bells and whistles, quality tv. After a week with the set, I think the reviewers were spot on. The picture quality is outstanding, and I haven't found a reason to play with the factory default settings. I have no complaints about the sound, but I use headphones most of the time when watching it. Installing the stand to the tv, attaching the cable holder and then connecting the tv to a couple of other devices is about as easy as it gets for start-up.I have the tv hooked up to a directv receiver, a dvd player and a Sony mdrrf985rk wireless headphone set. The directtv receiver connects to the tv through hdmi. Because the dvd player is relatively old, it connects to the tv through a composite video cable rather than through the tv's second hdmi port. The wireless headphones connect to the tv through the 3.5mm Audio Out jack on the back of the tv. Because the wireless headphones have their own volume control, I can set the tv's volume to zero while setting the headphone's volume to whatever I am comfortable with. I thought the hdmi cable connection on the side of the tv would extend past the frame of the tv and look funny, but the cable wraps back to the center of the tv where it is held in place by the cable holder.I am 100% satisfied. I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Samsung as TV and Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ralph Paoli
Reviews.Content: The Samsung HDTV 26" is a GREAT TV and PC monitor as well. Easy to assemble and started to function with NO problems.I alternate between TV and PC Monitor quickly using an HDMI-DVI cable. I use the PC speakers because the PC/DVI input is not supported. That's OK with me . I have good PC speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good Performer
Reviews.Author: Daniel Paradis
Reviews.Content: I use this TV with basic cable, and thanks to the QAM tuner, I now receive a number of channels I couldn't get with my old set, including the "Expanded Basic" channels.  There are lots of features, but it's quite easy to get started and pick up on the features as you need them.  I'm a little surprised they don't include an S-video input for those of us who own older DVD players, but the audio/video inputs work fine.  I would definitely recommend this set to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: W. R. Davis
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of the Samsung & Sharp TVs. These new LED TVs use almost no energy, $6 per year. I bought it for my bedroom because I was tired of looking at my little 19" tv. It works great. This one seems to be going on sale everywhere so check your wholeclubs for comparitive pricing. Amazon had the best price when I order it but my free shipping took a while for delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great t.v.
Reviews.Author: Florrey
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great sound - what more can I ask for?  It was easy to install and it looks great in my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Amazon is amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Pat "Pat"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 26" model from Samsung first. I loved it, but then thought I would like to see the 32" as well. The problem when you walk into a store is that with so many TVs around, its a bit difficult to gauge how a TV would look in your living room. My prime membership allowed me to get the 32" model in 2 days, then on comparison I decided to keep it and return the 26" TV.Amazon refunded me the entire cost without any hassles or questions - I simply love this company!! Never had any problems dealing with them for anything.The TV itself is great - it has all the required features of a modern LCD TV. One of the things I liked about this Samsung model (after an extensive research of comparing Samsung, Vizio, Magnavox, etc) is that you can connect a USB flash drive to the TV and it plays the movies saved on the flash drive. So I don't need to connect my macbook to the TV.Overall, really satisfied with the product and Amazon's customer service.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Shaneechantal
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, very clear. There is a lot of tweaking I had to do to get the picture the way I wanted it but I like it. Sound quality is amazing. Only thing I hated was putting the stand together.

Reviews.Title: Best 26in LED TV around
Reviews.Author: Zax
Reviews.Content: I am incredibly picky when it comes to my electronics, and I rarely write reviews, so for me to give this thing 4 stars I think probably means more than an average 4 star rating.The image quality on this thing is astounding. The picture is crisp, the viewing angle is impressively as good as the description, and the colors are near perfect (I did not even experience the red/orange problem a lot of Samsung TVs have).  Perhaps my favorite thing about this TV besides the picture is the ease of using USB media.  I bought this TV for my mom, and wanted her to be able to play pictures and videos off a flash drive.  Not only does it work, it only takes two button clicks to use.The only things that prevent me from giving this TV 5 stars are the lack of some features/ports and some weird ergonomics.  I knew going in the TV was going to be port shy, and given that it's only 26 inches it probably doesn't need them, but I'm surprised it doesn't have a VGA port. If you wanted to use this thing as a monitor as well, either go HDMI or look elsewhere.  Ergonomically, some of the ports are located on the side of the TV.  This would normally be fine, but they're very close to the side of the TV (instead of recessed), so you will always see cable sticking out the side somewhat.  Annoying, but not a deal breaker.I definitely recommend this TV as a best-in-class 26in option.

Reviews.Title: Excellent - high performing TV
Reviews.Author: Rhon Carleton
Reviews.Content: I have been exceedingly pleased with this Samsung 32 inch TV.  It was easy to install with additional components, sound and picture quality the best and shipping was right on time.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: David C
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture and the sound is good. Use it as a 2nd set in the bedroom. But if you need several outlets and inputs this one may not be for you. The stand could be a bit higher. Over all very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Television for an Awesome price
Reviews.Author: Sunnyt90
Reviews.Content: The television when I purchased it was a great price.  The quality is exceptional as I play PS3 on it and watch videos on it.  It is very clear depending on your quality of video.  The USB capability on the television by far was the best part of the television which I really didn't care about.  It allows you to plug your hard drive full of movies and play them straight off the hard drive.  The best is when you have a hard drive that is also powered by that same USB.  You can play almost all the traditional formats that you download movies from.  The remote that it comes with allows you to pause forward and play the movie so you can stop where you left off.  The USB capability will also allow you to run a slide show of your pictures that you have taken and put on the hard drive as well if you want to run a slide show for an event.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Rajneesh Garg
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV for its size, price and features - unbox it, connect to your cable or antenna, scan it and it is ready to use.Image quality is fantastic. Sound is also good. There are enough options (for both picture and sound quality) available to customize your viewing criterion.TV Remote has a back lit option, allowing it to be used in dark settings. 2 HDMI ports allows me to connect to my cable and PS3. To connect to my laptop, I need to disconnect one of these :( You can watch your own videos and movies using USB port. So far, I have played videos in avi, mkv and vob format. I hope other format (e.g. mp4, flv and dat) are also supported. Even subtitles are supported! I was not looking for wi-fi connectivity as I have it through my PS3.On the another hand, TV stand is plastic and is flimsy. Also, as found by another reviewer, TV is slightly tilted.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: E. Gudas "Edventure73"
Reviews.Content: I would buy this TV again.  It has all of the features that I wanted and looks great.  I have had it for a few months now and it is serving it's purpose as my secondary TV perfectly.  My big Sony TV is upstairs with the stereo system.  When that is overtaken by my wife and 2 daughters I hide out in the basement with this Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Needs a much better stand
Reviews.Author: DenverRMS
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific TV for the money. My only complaint, is the stand.It is very flimsy and more importantly, not adjustable, but I'm otherwise happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, excellent value!
Reviews.Author: Todd C. Peres
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV under the "slightly used" category.  Recieved TV quickly and in excellent condition.....it sure looks and works like brand new to me!  Saved $100 gutting this slightly used model and I would do so again.  Perfect bedroom TV, excellent picture, easy set up, light weight and easy to install on wall mount.  Sound is more than adequate for bedroom set.  Would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" 720p LED
Reviews.Author: Englewood FL
Reviews.Content: this TV was fine for our purposes, the size fit our small condo just about right and the picture is decent even on non-HD channels (basic Comcast cable), it is very light and was easy to mount on an arm

Reviews.Title: tv seems good, base is not so good
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Markman
Reviews.Content: got this tv for my home office.  the tv works fine but the base that you put on with wood screws is just really really cheap plastic and went on crooked.  cant seem to get it straight.  driving me nuts.

Reviews.Title: Good for a bedroom set
Reviews.Author: Hemster
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is certainly up there with the best of them but you will need to tweak the factory default settings to get the best out of it.The sound is good enough for a small room (kitchen or bedroom) which is typical of thin LED TVs. Thin is good but the down side is that the speakers are also tinny. i bought a pair of powered speakers and now the sound is very decent.

Reviews.Title: exactly what you would expect
Reviews.Author: Indygreg "IndyGreg"
Reviews.Content: got these for my kids rooms.  They are just okay, but that is expected at this price.  Decent picture, decent build.  Nothing about it is above average, but nor is it below average.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4000 32-inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: gerald nancarrow
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv "Used Like New" through Amazon and couldn't be happier if I paid for a brand new one. It came in the original box, it looks new to me and cost much less. It works great with my Samsung sound bar I purchased shortly after the tv (from Amazon also). Prime shipping with both was great, and here in 2 days. The tv stand was missing 4 screws, but a quick trip to the hardware store solved that problem. Very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Amazingly Light
Reviews.Author: Thomas Ryan "Tom Ryan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a motorhome application. I don't think I could have found a better solution. It's mounted to the side of a cabinet on a universally adjustable swing arm, and the light weight, screen size, and black edge make it the perfect solution for viewing from a few feet away.

Reviews.Title: Pros/Cons for 26-28" TVs - Samsung UN26EH4000
Reviews.Author: Neil E. Isenberg
Reviews.Content: This review is for the Samsung UN26EH4000 LED TelevisionSAMSUNG UN26EH4000----------------------- BLACKS: Excellent blacks, night sky in background looks good.- PICTURE:  This is 720p (not 1080p), some say it doesn't matter at this size, others say 1080p helps at this size.  I'm trying to find a setting giving me better texture and color accuracy.  Note that if you are after a bright look and can't raise "brightness" more without ruining the look you are after, consider raising Contrast up and choosing Dynamic for picture mode.- VIEWING ANGLE:  While there are color issues as you move further off-center the picture doesn't fall apart and become unviewable, you can still see the picture, which isn't always the case with smaller TVs.- NO HEADPHONE JACK: No headphone jack (where you plug headphone in and the sound only comes out through headphones).  The line out doesn't take headphone line jack.  Can't imagine why a smaller TV like this wouldn't come with a headphone jack.- SOUND:  Compared to many others I've tested at stores the built-in audio is okay, however if quality sound is important expect to get an external speaker set of some kind (sound bar, ZVOX 220, Bose Solo, etc).- IN:  Has 2 HDMI, 1 Component (Y/G/B/R/W), 1 RF Cable/Antennae- CONTROLS:  Once you learn to operate the single joystick button under the TV you're fine, some folks might take some time getting used to the lack of explicit buttons.  For example holding the button in gets rid of the control overlay on the screen.  Of course there is always the remote that comes with it.

Reviews.Title: Another great TV from Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Jae Rosemeyer
Reviews.Content: This is the second TV purchase I've made in the last 3 months after going 13 years since my last purchase.  It wasn't planned that way, but after buying the 32 inch version of this one to replace our old 30 inch CRT that was still working the 27 inch CRT in our bedroom went black a few weeks later!  I could have moved the old 30 inch into the bedroom, but if you remember those old style TVs were HEAVY!!!  Not sure of the exact weight, but I'm guessing at least 100 pounds.  Anyways, it's sitting in our garage waiting for garage-sale season.On to the Samsung 26 inch.  It is lightweight(maybe 15 pounds?), affordable(I paid $227), and energy-efficient(about $5 a year - LED technology).  It's the perfect size for a bedroom TV and I've decided that once the tiny 15 inch CRT in the kitchen goes out we will move it into there and move the 32 inch into the bedroom.  This will give me an excuse to buy something a little bigger for the living room!  In case you're thinking about using this as a kitchen TV make sure you measure the height of your cabinets from the counter before purchasing.  I have about a half-inch extra room and it's big enough that I won't strain my eyes watching while sitting at the dining table.The only complaint I have is the complicated remote.  Way too many buttons for what I consider is a simple TV!  I do, however, like the illumination button which my 32 inch does not have despite being a 4000 series TV of the same model year.  This feature has come in very handy while watching TV in bed with the lights off.  Also, it is NOT a skinny TV!  I'm guessing 3 1/2 inches thick in the back, but this allows it to have decent sound(something those ultra-thin TVs have a hard time accomplishing) so it's not really a complaint for me.  Wall-mounters should know this, however.Not the cheapest TV in this size out there, but I think for what you get it is a good deal and I'm sure will last for many years.  I recommend it!Jae

Reviews.Title: All I expected and more
Reviews.Author: Thomas "Thomas e McCullough"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before I bought this TV. And because of the good reviews and the brand name quality, I decided to go for it. The picture is great! The price was reasonable. I remember reading some negative reviews on the sound but, I think the sound is great! Great TV. Great deal. Maybe not something you want as a centerpiece for a living room. But, perfect for a bedroom type setting.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: rmiller
Reviews.Content: I actually got this TV at Best Buy as an open box item. I originally went for a 24 inch LG 1080p set, and at the time I felt like that resolution was a must. When I saw the brilliant color on this TV my mind was changed.  I ended up getting it, and after setting it up, I havent regretted it a bit. Great size for my room,  awesome picture, great sound, and a solid brand in Samsung. I still wish it was 1080p, but at this size its not a huge deal. I now believe that I would shell out full price, knowing what I know now, if I had the option again without the open box deal.

Reviews.Title: Love the Media Play feature
Reviews.Author: Dix "GameSlave"
Reviews.Content: For the price and features i believe this is the best option for people like me. I dont care for Smart TV and Apps, i prefer my tablet for that. What i love is the connectshare movie feature (i have a large collection of .mkv files) and being able to watch it without any media player is priceless, and i dont understand why other tv brands have not gone the same route. The TV is very light, it has mid-range black-levels (viewing angles are not so great for a living room), great color saturation and basic connections. It has a small frame but Its not thin because it uses a different tech to light the leds (but at the same time it accomplishes better uniformity for that same reason, so no "clouding"), which imho is far more important than thinness. All in all, great for the price.

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: adamspeed
Reviews.Content: bought this tv for the bedroom came in the box in excellent condtion. and hook it up had no problems works great.

Reviews.Title: Good small screen LED TV
Reviews.Author: JOHN J. GREENE
Reviews.Content: This TV is similar in many ways to the other two and larger Samsung TV's that I have. It has a very crisp HD pcture, it is easy to set up and to use. The audio is not as good as the others. it is adequate but has a tinny quality. I think that this is because of the smaller speakers and maybe because I have not yet tried to customize the audio. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: J. Young "J Young"
Reviews.Content: Only 720 P but excellent picture with a 26" screen.  Installed easily for use as a secondary set in the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: E. Solch
Reviews.Content: I hung this one up in the living room. The picture is very good for the price. Sound quality is OK, would prefer speakers in the front, as its louder from behind the TV on the wall mount. I have a telescoping mount that moves side to side so I can adjust it and that is the only problem I have with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: D. M. Harnden "Tool Wife"
Reviews.Content: This TV was so easy to set up, the number of adjustments to customize it to your taste seem endless, the picture quality in HD is awesome, and it instructs you or explains to you, all on screen, every move you make.  Gone is the endless frustration of learning mountains of menus.  It is also great that when you make a change say in picture quality, the picture changes to your selection before you leave the menu, so that you don't exit, look at it, decide to go back into the menu again, etc.  It's a fantastic user-friendly TV.

Reviews.Title: Sumsung 26" TV
Reviews.Author: RHyde
Reviews.Content: It has a very clear and bold picture. It has very good sound quality. Fits very well in my office.

Reviews.Title: Buying on-line - you have to trust the site above all else
Reviews.Author: RG
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a good brand. Amazon is a trusted site. I knew Amazon would make the deal right if there was a problem. I bought a refurb and saved a ton of money. The overall product quality is what I expected and the picture quality is as good as Samsung gets.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rodger
Reviews.Content: I replaced an older Vizio with this Samsung and couldn't be more pleased.  As with every Samsung I've seen, it has an awesome picture, great colors, and excellent (for a TV) sound.  Unlike a some panels the viewing angle is much less a problem.  It's also almost as light as a feather so it could be mounted anywhere.  The USB attached storage player plays everything I've thrown at it - unlike a few other brands I've tried.  Also works natively with a Harmony remote. If you're in the market for a 26" HDTV, this one is great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent 26 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Ed T.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it was rated as the best in its size category.  The ratings were correct!  It was easy to assemble and connect.  Its color and overall picture quality are great.  I am completely satisfied with this TV.  When I registered it on line, I got an extra 3 month extension on my warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Martha L. Rhodes "WVBeetleBug"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice sized second tv. The price is very good for a Samsung and it is really good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Larsonsmom
Reviews.Content: My 19 inch tube tv finally died in my bedroom.  Amazon had the best deal on a tv in this size range.  The tv arrived on time.  Was easy to set up.  The picture and sound are great!  I like this tvs picture than the one on my 4 year old Sony 1080i that I have in my living room!

Reviews.Title: Just the right size for our over garage suite.
Reviews.Author: ejoel
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up.  Great  picture and sound from a small TV.  Reasonable priced.  Will use it with our Blu-Ray player for HD movies.

Reviews.Title: Am happy with my new Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn Durovich
Reviews.Content: Am very happy with our new TV.  Received the TV way before the delivery date noted on the email confirmation.  It was very easy to install.  We purchased this TV for our spare bedroom where our grandchildren stay when they come to visit. It was the right size for the small bedroom.  The picture is perfect and we are very happy with the product.  All our flat screen TV's are Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Carole Wright
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my husband, he loves.  It was easy to hook up, has a great picture.  He likes everything about it.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT SIZE FOR KITCHEN
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a TV that fit in my Kitchen Cabinet  of 31" & this tv was perfect.It's a quality TV at a reasonable price ($229).Weighs only 14 pounds & easy to move around & put up in a high cabinet over 72" frig.LED allows you to adjust lights from behind picture so picture is bright & not dark.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: ginnyw
Reviews.Content: This TV fits where I needed it, works well, the remote is easy to understand, and the sound and picture quality as good as one would expect from a set this size. Very easy to assemble and set up.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: TonyK
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my kids for Xmas and it has a great picture.  good inputs and easy to use controller.  it is a little thicker than I expected from the LED description, but still light.  the sounds is good for a small room, the low settings are quiet enough to hear in the room, and the loud settings can be heard through the house.

Reviews.Title: Best picture resolution ever!!
Reviews.Author: C "Britrock"
Reviews.Content: This little 26" led tv packs a punch.  For the little money, you get some nice features.  Foremost, the picture quality is stellar.  The tiny speakers amazingly enough sound very good.  There's some nice sound and picture settings on the menu.  The backlit remote control is great at night.  Overall a stellar buy!!

Reviews.Title: Sound is fine but I'm less pleased with the picture
Reviews.Author: Steven G
Reviews.Content: People on screen appear to lack facial texture. It's as if a make-up artist patted them up with lots of face powder.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear tv
Reviews.Author: Marc
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear tv makes smaller screen easy to see. Very lightweight and easy to mount. Took about 5 minutes to mount with only one person. Everything you expect from a samsung tv. Strongly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" LED TV - Great
Reviews.Author: ASchear
Reviews.Content: I was in the market this past June for a new television after I moved to a small apartment.  I searched and searched for a solid TV with some good input options and nice picture, but without features I didn't need like internet connectivity or a super thin design.  This Samsung TV fit the bill for me.Price is just right because you don't have to pay for the extra bells and whistles.Picture is great.Sounds good and the built in speakers are enough for my bedroom.Extremely lightweight.Uses very little power.Great input options - RCA / component video, 2x HDMI, 1x USB, audio out, Coaxial (I use the LEAF antenna and it works great)Switches between inputs quickly and knows which inputs are in use (skips the unused ones)Remote control is solid and has a backlight for night time use.Looks great aesthetically in my bedroom. (This was an important one for me.)After using it for 6 months, I recommend this TV to anyone looking in the $200 range.  It is a quality product and I look forward to using it for quite some time!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: D. R.
Reviews.Content: Priced decently and video quality is quite good. Also, you can view pictures, play music, and play videos from your USB key. This is a very important feature for me.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: jersey girl
Reviews.Content: very light, easy to set up.screen is bright. no trouble watching during day time even right next to windows.

Reviews.Title: beautiful a little small for my eye
Reviews.Author: RafiK "zeetop"
Reviews.Content: this is a beautiful TV even when we connected it via coax, the resolution is very very good. Great value for the money - highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV, JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR BEDROOM!
Reviews.Author: dustin "dustin"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE THIS TV IN MY BEDROOM SETTING ON A DRESSER. IT IS THE PERFECT SIZE TO SIT ON THE DRESSER, AND THE PERFECT SIZE FOR VIEWING. USE IT APPROX. 1-2 HOURS DAILY. VERY HAPPY FOR A TV THAT WAS FREE WITH A SAMSUNG BUNDLE!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000
Reviews.Author: Woody
Reviews.Content: The order shipped and arrived very promptly. This TV has a great picture, with nice tones and contrast. The sound quality is pretty good too. Can't beat it for the price

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good TV...and I got a good TV. It is exactly what I wanted. Perfect TV for a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love this TV.
Reviews.Author: Roberta
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a few months ago, and had to wait for my son to return this week to hook it up for me with my TIVO etc.  It was worth waiting for. I am delighted.  I am particular about the sound quality on TV's, but this is excellent.  I am also very particular about picture quality, and I am extremely pleased with the color and crispness of the picture.  I actually had bought the same model not long ago at a local store, thinking it would be easy to return if dissatisfied, but I loved it so much that I was delighted to find I could get a 2nd one, the very same model, from Amazon.  I highly recommend this Samsung HDTV. I Have it in my bedroom, and the size is perfect and the picture is perfect.

Reviews.Title: samsung 32inch
Reviews.Author: James Howard, Jr.
Reviews.Content: This device was a breeze to assemble and setup for cable. It is vdry lightweight and nice looking. Nice blacks and great color. I would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: sail
Reviews.Content: We have a small porch and wanted a 26" TV, we have purchased the Samsung TV before and love the quality. We are using a inside antenna in the attic and the picture is great. Love our choice.

Reviews.Title: Good inexpensive tv
Reviews.Author: J. Prato
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this.  There are better quality TV's out there, but for the money, this is perfect for or needs.  This is a good budget tv for a small room. My other old tube tv FINALLY broke, and I could justify purchasing this tv.  I have had it for over a month and its perfect for the bedroom.  Inexpensive and decent quality.  You can't go wrong at this price level.

Reviews.Title: My first LED
Reviews.Author: J. F. Dean
Reviews.Content: Ok, this is my first LED TV.  The only thing I have to compare it with is my 58" Panny plasma.  By that comparison, this one's "ok".  It serves my purpose as something to watch while I'm on the computer, paying bills or doing work in my home office.  But there's something "synthetic" about the picture that I don't like. I'm sure it has to do with the backlighting.  It was easy to set up though and the controls for color, tint, etc. are quite good.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV at an amazing price
Reviews.Author: Master Yoda
Reviews.Content: Overall this TV is excellent. It doesn't have some of the advanced features available in more expensive TVs (like the ability to connect to the internet) but I'm not looking for a TV to do many different things....I just want a TV to watch TV shows and movies on and this does just that with excellent picture quality. I don't know too much about the sound quality as I watch my stuff with headphones.The only main issues I have is that this TV doesn't come with a headphone jack....it only has an AUDIO OUT jack. The audio out jack is similar to a headphone jack in that you CAN attach a headphone to it...BUT, you cannot control the volume of your headphones using the TV volume. If you select External Speakers, the TV sound is turned off and you cannot even access volume control on the TV. So what you need is either external speakers of some sort, a receiver, an amplifier for your headphones of some sort, or headphones with a built in volume control on the headphone wire (which, thankfully, I have).  Also, the TV on the stand tends to tilt to the side. No problem for me since I can place something under the TV at the side to straighten it up. But the TV stand does not tilt up or down at all....it is stuck in one place keeping the TV at an angle which isn't a big problem at all but it would have been nice to have the ability to put the TV at an angle I want depending on if I am laying down or sitting up.CALIBRATION SETTINGSThese are the settings I use for the video settings. I did these settings on a LG Blu-Ray player using the Spears and Munsil HD Benchmark Calibration Blu-Ray Disc in a dark room. Keep in mind I am no expert and did these to the best of my ability so they are not perfect.MODE: MovieBacklight: 14-20 (depending on the darkness of the room and what my eyes can handle at the time)Contrast: 76Brightness: 43Sharpness: 0-14 (see note at bottom)Color: 57Tint- 50-50Picture Options/AdvancedColor Tone: Warm 1Black Tone: Darkest (Optional- see notes at bottom)Note 1- Sharpness: I originally had this at 0. I just watched Titanic and noticed that the picture had a smoothness to it and the picture stood out as great but not excellent. I upped the sharpness to 11-14 and settled on 12 and now the picture on Titanic is excellent and right near Avatar. I have to see more movies at 12 sharpness to see what works best. A lot of video experts will say to keep sharpness at 0 or near 0 but not every TV is the same so in some cases it may not be the best. Of course, in the end it comes down to personal preference....it's not about what I think looks best it's about what YOU think looks best. I recommend trying 0 sharpness all the way up to 20 while your watching a movie to see what setting you like the best (although, don't go overboard as eventually you will see artifacts which ruins the picture).Note 2- Dark Tone: This setting is supposed to make blacks look more black. This is just a preference of mine but I like Darkest the best. Blacks do look more black on Darkest. I don't know what else it does to the picture or if there is any loss of detail with it on but I have to say I like Darkest on. I turned it off and on while watching a movie and didn't notice it doing anything bad to the picture other than making blacks look more black. Of course, as I said before, it is about what you think looks best so try it off and then on and see what you like.For the price, this TV is amazing and I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this tv. The picture quality is very good, and the remote works good. I would recomend this tv to freinds.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Roy
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV.  HD picture is great.  Only downside is that the HDMI connections are only on the side of the TV and not in the back.  It makes hiding wires to the satellite or cable connection impossible.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: TAUR3AN
