Reviews.Content: First time ordering a TV online and I am pretty pleased with the experience and the product.  I am a fan of Samsung products, and this one meets my expectations.  Will be buying a larger size Samsung Smart TV soon!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: It is a TV that is perfect for a bedroom or kitchen. It has a great picture and fine sound.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Brony
Reviews.Content: The tv came quickly and has a great picture.  We had only room for a 26" in our room and it fit perfectly.I looked at many reviews on this site and the set has lived up to expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Throckmorton P. Ruddygore "Ruddy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this model after being very happy with the purchase of the Samsung un55d6000. The un55 is and edge lit, while this model is smaller and is a fully LED backlit TV, which means some of the "spotlighting" and "clouding" apparent on the un55 are absent from this model. The TV was easy to set up. As mentioned in other reviews, there are only a couple of HDMI ports, 1 USB port, and come with component jacks. The TV looks terrific, as I have come to expect from Samsung. Here are a few points I found that differed from reviews I've read:- First, my stand connected without issue, however mine had 8 screws - 4 to connect to TV and 4 to connect TV portion to the rest of the stand. I had no problems with the installation and the TV is level.- I didn't see a huge difference is picture quality when viewing from different angles. However this is in my bedroom, which is one of the darker rooms in the house.- USB will play movies, music, and pictures; however it appears that the device needs to be a thumb/flash drive. I tried connecting my external hard drive and the TV would not recognize it. However this shouldn't be counted against the TV, as the box clearly states that it will play movies from a flash drive. The external hard drive was only a hope on my part.So far I'm extremely pleased with my Samsung TV purchases this year. Just hope they hold up with time and continue to provide a quality viewing experience.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the value and price paid
Reviews.Author: k_dub
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this product from amazon, but I felt I should comment here because I used a lot of these reviews, as well as those on cnet.com to make my decision, so hopefully this will help others as well. This is my first flat screen tv purchase, and I am very pleased with it. I am using it as a replacement for a 20-inch GE tube tv that I've had since 1997. Nothing is wrong w/the 20-inch; I just wanted to splurge on myself and I'm glad I did.This tv is in my bedroom and like the cnet.com review for this tv said, I would also recommend nothing smaller than a 32-inch for a bedroom. Like other reviewers have stated, the picture is very clear, crisp, and colorful (and I don't subscribe to HD cable) and the design is very sleek although, as some reviewers have pointed out, it is a bit thick. Not a deal-breaker for me. What's interesting is that I'm able to receive some HD channels w/this tv w/o the use of a cable box. I have a cable box hooked up to a 27-inch tube tv in the living room, but I'm unable to receive any HD channels on the 27-inch tv.I also agree with some reviewers regarding the remote control. It does seem like the buttons are a bit too close together, some are in strange places, and its shape is a bit uncomfortable for your hand; a remote control design that would have some curves in it - and maybe just a bit wider - would be ideal. Using the remote to navigate the on-screen menus was a bit cumbersome. For example, the main arrow controls are at the bottom of the remote, so you're only holding on to a small portion of the remote when you set-up the tv. I felt that I had to keep looking at the remote to make sure I was hitting the correct buttons. Placing the arrow keys at the top of the remote would feel more comfortable. Overall placement/layout of the buttons, in my opinion, is not very ergonomic.I like that you can auto-program channels; however, you can only edit analog channels. When I went through the auto-program process, it downloaded digital channels that I subscribe to, but they do not match up w/the channel names on the channel list from my cable service provider. For example, channel 902 on the channel list comes out as 91-902 after the auto-program; channel 710 comes out as 100-710. So instead of entering 902 or 710, you have to enter the additional numbers. This is a minor annoyance which will take some getting used to.Some mentioned the joy stick controller on the tv. I've used it a few times already and have not had a problem it. I guess if you have difficulty w/fine motor skills, it could be problematic.Regarding the stand, based on my assembly, it's not the stand itself that's wobbly: It's the piece that connects the tv to the actual stand. No matter how hard I tightened the screws (and you have to be careful when you tighten screws in plastic), it's still loose. For those reviewers who mentioned the stand going on crooked to where the tv is angled/tilted: The manual clearly shows that you have to basically slide the stand into the tv. If you angle the stand at all, it will come out angled.So far, I'm extremely pleased with this tv as my first venture into the flat screen realm. Sure, it doesn't have a lot of the bells and whistles that some may want, but for use in my bedroom just to watch tv, it's perfect.  I would give it 5 stars but because of the remote and stand, I think 4 is accurate. I think it's an excellent value for the price paid, and I plan to get a lot of use out of it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice - great picture and sound!
Reviews.Author: Sam Courtney
Reviews.Content: We shopped for several months and found this TV to be the best option for features and price. It has great color display and sound without external speakers - we use it in our bedroom and it works perfectly. It is not heavy and easy to install and connect. For an LED, it is just what you need in this size range.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: wallyf
Reviews.Content: This TV works great and provides a good picture and sound.  For the money, it is a very good value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jim Hodge
Reviews.Content: Just the right size for a bedroom, or any room for that matter.  I purchased as a gift and really was impressed with the delivery, quality of the picture and features.  Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" HDTV
Reviews.Author: Newtonite
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, easy to set up, worked right out of the box, and picture is great.  Complaints about sound are unfounded.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth, Kitty Hawk, NC
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 32" TV is exactly what I thought it would be.  It has a great picture and was very simple to set up and we are very pleased with the purchased.  Consumer Report had rated this TV highly.My only complaint is the delivery.  The TV was delivered to the correct address.  However, the TV was left in the carport in front of our car in a blinding rain storm even though I was home at the time.  There was no doubt as to what was in the box since it was clearly marked Samsung TV and therefore could have easily been stolen.  It was out of sight from the street though.  The delivery person made no attempt at all to knock on our door.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: bella89
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a small bedroom. Picture and sound quality are better than expected! Great price for a Samsung and arrived quickly. I have browsed for many months comparing tv's for a price I could afford and I'm happy I was able to find excellent quality within my price range.

Reviews.Title: Samsung review
Reviews.Author: Francis L. Cunningham "ButchAZ"
Reviews.Content: Great TV no regrets! Good color ,lite weight, low power consumption, ideal for any office or bedroom location! Always love Samsung!

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Ilgen "Ilgendolls"
Reviews.Content: I first looked in the Consumers Guide for the "Best 32 inch TV" and found this model. It came in only 3 days and we hooked it up. Great picture and was easy to hook up. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: D. Davis "Super Dave"
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the money; very happy with the product. Picture is very crisp. I also have a LCD TV and like the picture from this LED better.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Great picture, good sound and it's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: We bought this for the bedroom.. Inexpensive LED with excellent picture and sound.... but then I expected no less from Samsung!UPDATE 6 months in, still a great picture love this little tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: P. Skiba "library guru"
Reviews.Content: I studied all the comments about the different television brands.  I had a TV in my kitchen that I couldn't stand the sound.  The 32" Samsung that I bought from Amazon was perfect.  Delivery was prompt and the TV was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer!
Reviews.Author: Bessie G. Lynch "Nanny"
Reviews.Content: When I opened the box with my new Samsung HDTV I was so impressed! Since it has been hooked up and is now working with my cable connection, I am EVEN more impressed. I had thought I would have to have the extra expense of HD service but after it was hooked up I realized it would not be necessary. The picture is awesome just like it is now with standard cable service, that saves me monthly and makes me love it even more! I will enjoy my new TV and I am glad I looked at the Amazon site to decide what I wanted for my next TV. I love Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4000 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Hermine Stover "Hermine  Stover"
Reviews.Content: I remember when a TV screen was the smaller than a pieplate and black and white. I went for roughly twenty five years with no TV sometime in the early sixties onward. I have a six foot wide TV in the living room and frankly, it makes me want to sit outside in my pickup truck and watch it through the window, as if I am in a drive-in movie. So I was very happy with this little light weight telly which I assembled easily and then had a conversation with my FIOS people about setting it up, which was somewhat challenging. I do not blame Sony for this; How could then know about my FIOS situation? I still miss my  big, thick heavy Sony Trinitron with its surround sound kind of system and its 250lbs of metal and glass. I miss it----- but its on-off button died and the fixit price was more than the purchase price of this TV. So after looking at what a modern flat telly costs and its impact on my life, I would say this set at this price is a very fine thing indeed.It is SHOCKINGLY crisp, something which currently filmed programs require. Old movies look the same as they always did. a good deal all round.

Reviews.Title: Audio, No Picture. Samsung wants to repair it!!!
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: We purchased this Tv on Black Friday, arrived Saturday Next day Air and Does not work. We have audio but no Video, we contacted Samsung and they want to repair the set. Plus they want us to send it to a service center.  I have spent over 2 hours on the phone with people that I could not understand and are of no help, they said they will call back..RIGHT!Samsung UN32EH4003 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Leonard Balter
Reviews.Content: Just got my 32".  Easy to installl, easy to use and it looks great on the wall in my gym.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 1
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful TV with great color and sound great picture and easy to use remote. just the right size for a smaller room or camper, travel trailer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome t.v. and very light
Reviews.Author: KC PMP "kevin"
Reviews.Content: This television is perfect for your bedroom or kitchen. It's very light in weight and has a great picture. And look at the price! I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Really nice set
Reviews.Author: Emile Bonnecaze
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom and since it was replacing an old 32" Sony, I thought it would be fine. I was wrong - I wish I'd have gone for the next model up. The difference in format means that this new set is a little smaller than the old one and, it is the 720p rather than the 1080 which the next model was. At any rate, the picture is excellent and I am very pleased. My only concerns were caused by my own screw-ups and not the TV. Just wish I'd have paid an additional $70 or so and gotten the (slightly) bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Gary "In New Hampshire"
Reviews.Content: This television is excellent and a great value.  I highly recommend it, the picture is great and setup is quite easy

Reviews.Title: Nice little LED TV
Reviews.Author: bluskys789
Reviews.Content: I bought this to go in my bedroom on top of a chest of drawers opposite my bed.  We just have a cable box hooked up to it, but no sound system or anything else.  It works just fine, but I have noticed that the volume level will spontaneously and occasionally lower without me or my husband doing anything.  It is very noticeable, but the volume level goes back to where we set it in a matter of seconds.  I cannot say that I know this is caused by some problem with the TV, because it could be the cable box.  I haven't had a chance to really investigate this problem, yet.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Display, Great Sound, Got it on Sale, I win!
Reviews.Author: Ira D. Hill
Reviews.Content: This is truly an amazing tv.  I was almost swayed by the allure of all the 40" LCD's, but this 32" feels bigger than it is when it gets inside of your home.  The clarity is remarkable.  Most cable shows and games are only displayed in 720p so there is no immediate need to get the 1080p.  For the price and upswing in value, you don't need wifi for this model.  There are no widgets...so what.  This LED TV makes my home a little bit more cosy!  My PS3 games now looks better than the displays in the sony store now.Pros:*Picture quality*Clear sound*Volume range is amazing*Thin edges*Light weightCons:*Does not swivel*stand made out of plastic*samsung remote is hard to read in the darkNote:  There are only two HDMI connections and one usb interface all located on the right of the TV.  The remote comes with batteries.  Even though i use a universal cable remote, the Samsung remote is hard to read in the dark, but it doesn't really matter.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Fizzie
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, perfect size for the bedroom.  Arrived in good shape and on time.  Excellent for the requirements that I had.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lew, Haddonfield NJ
Reviews.Content: I bought this model -- which is exactly the same as a larger Samsung that we have in our family room --for our bedroom.  Same clear HD picture as our larger TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Trapped in Delaware
Reviews.Content: I had a very limited space and this 26 inch model was perfect for it.  Everything about it is awesome.  First and foremost, it was easy to connect to our digital cable box.  It is very lightweight and easy to handle once out of the box.  The color and clarity are stellar, and the viewing angle from all sides of the room is stellar even from up to 8-10 feet away.  The speakers in this thing do a nice job as well and the remote is easy to use.  I am VERY satisfied with this purchase and for the price it is a true bargain.  Samsung does it again, excellent look, quality, and performance as always.  If you are comparing other 26 inch models to this one, save yourself some time and select this.  HIGHLY recommend.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: B. Spieker
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung television UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) (2012 Model) in July of 2012 that was so highly rated by Consumer Reports. It is broke. It will not turn on. It is within warranty but I am waiting to hear if I have to ship it in or bring it in, either way a giant hassle for me, not to mention the fact that I am and will be out of a TV until this is resolved. I am just so supremely angry I cannot begin to tell you.And might I add that previously, I had my Zenith big butt TV for 17 years before it broke!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Smith
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for my bedroom and the picture quality is far superior to my living room TV.  Excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000- 26 in 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sheryl L. Holt "Marcel's disciple"
Reviews.Content: This little TV packs a punch. It is light enough to carry without duress, but when you plug it in, you have a perfect picture, perfect for video games, TV shows, computer hook-up, whatever we like. The WIFI is wonderful and allows us to use the TV without cable or internet hook up. It is a simple TV to use, but a wonderful addition to our entertainment life!

Reviews.Title: The best!
Reviews.Author: Kristine Holmgren "Kris"
Reviews.Content: I waited - I shopped - I compared - and I got the best!  This television is not only "smart," it delivers the clearest, easiest to view (and listen to) projection I've ever had.  I recommend this Samsung highly!  It's my only television.  I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great "All-Purpose" unit
Reviews.Author: Frenchy
Reviews.Content: I have owned this tv for about a year. Picture is great [you don't need 1080p unless you go over 32" in size.] It is rugged. I had the top of my cabinet fall on and knock it to the floor (about 30"). I figured that it was toast but I found it to be undamaged, no cracks, chips or anything else. I set back in place and turned it on. It's still going strong. That happened about 3 days after I received it. Speakers are okay and it has the Auto Volume Control that allows you to set and forget. However, you do give up this feature when you tie in to your surround sound system. It is HDMI and fiber optic ready. I have  a Bluray player but only 3 or 4 Bluray discs, so I wondered how well a regular disc would look. Using the HDMI connection, I tried "The DaVinci Code" (I have it both ways) and could not distinguish any difference in picture quality between the two.  It displays well in a bright room and on screen menus make shifting from aux inputs to tv, and back, very easy. It is light, one hand can pick it up and move it, and thin. Being an LED/LCD it uses a lot less power than plasma and is much, much more reliable. I'm not a techno-geek so I don't stream, play video games, or have apps on it. However, it does have that capability. It is a good "all-purpose" unit; large enough to be a main tv but small enough to be more personal.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Phillips
Reviews.Content: Good clear picture. Menu takes some time to get used to. Preset timer turns off actions when there is a power disruption. If you are depending on it to wake you in the morning and the power is interrupted for even an instant during the night, you may be late for work. Light weight makes it easy to mount high on the bedroom wall. Sound is OK; typical of newer sets, it's not great and a sound bar would be needed to get high quality.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Chris Chilson
Reviews.Content: Unlike the 2013 model 4003 that replaced it, the 4000 has a full set of audio out jacks, including a 3.5 mm headphone jack. Good picture, ok sound and a backlit remote. No Smart TV on this model, available on the 5000 series. Very low power consumption, with 4 power (brightness) levels (all under 30 watts) means this unit could be run with a battery/inverter during a power outage.Very good HD picture, average SD picture. Sound is adequate for bedroom use, a 5 band equalizer and "pseudo surround" give audio quality similar to a decent table radio. I may add a Roku to give it "Smart" capabilities in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and great price!
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Samsung are the best TV's.  Great for the small rooms.  So glad I bought this one.Buy one!

Reviews.Title: Buy it you won't be sorry!
Reviews.Author: Pat M
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are terrific! I'd recommend it highly! It's one of the best I've seen in this size!

Reviews.Title: Our best TV yet!
Reviews.Author: nanyannie
Reviews.Content: We bought this small size TV for our kitchen (on top of a counter) and are so pleased with it.  The size is good, not overpowering the counter (our previous one was really too small and better as a computer monitor).  We are especially pleased that the picture comes on immediately after pressing the on button!

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for a mid sized bedroom.
Reviews.Author: flwrgrl80
Reviews.Content: Good sound, good picture, good features.  Everything I expect from Samsung.  I have three tvs in my house and all are Samsung.  I've never been disappointed in their products.  Amazon delivery is the best!

Reviews.Title: Really nice TV
Reviews.Author: bwd234
Reviews.Content: Very nice picture and sound.  Large 32' screen can be seen quite easily across the room.  Picture is crystal clear and sound is loud and not tinny or boomy at all.  Sounds like it's coming from a good stereo system.  Also love the HDMI input and ability to plug in a USB thumbdrive to watch downloaded movies or videos.  Very happy with this and glad I purchased it.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Working great.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie McCloud
Reviews.Content: REALLY great picture. It's our only TV. It's working great. We have it mounted on the wall and it looks nice.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: harry
Reviews.Content: Great machines and at a great price from AmazonI have two of these now.... One of them is in  our kitchenand the other I use a computer monitor

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000 26-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Nancy M. Cousins
Reviews.Content: I gave my husband this TV for Christmas 2012.He loves it so much I am going to give him a larger one for 2013.It has a beautiful picture and works perfectly.I would recommend this TV to everyone.Thanks

Reviews.Title: TV for Yacht Club
Reviews.Author: not my thing
Reviews.Content: Sound is not great, but guess that's the basic problem with all flat screens.  On time delivery.  Picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: gianina1948
Reviews.Content: Has all the qualities in a TV that I was looking for.  Great resolution and picture.  A very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Sensation
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I researched this until well before purchasing. All the reviews looked great and at the time, the price couldn't be beat.Great picture but with almost all flat screen TVs, the speakers aren't up to snuff. Bought a sound bar to help but that's another story in itself. The remote is a bit awkward but I was planning to buy a universal remote anyway. Opted for the Harmony 650 to handle the sound bar, TV and HDMI inputs from my computer and Roku box.You can dig into the TV's menu to customize as much as you wish and save your changes as a different profile.A 32" TV is fairly small these days but my viewing distance is only a few feet. I use this more as an extension of my laptop screen more than a TV. As TVs go, bigger is almost always better but I just didn't need it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Romualdo
Reviews.Content: Got this as a additional with my smart TV.Great gift and it can be used as a extended monitor in my home office.

Reviews.Title: nice tv from samsung
Reviews.Author: Giovani L.
Reviews.Content: the picture on this tv is great and its thin bezel makes this tv quite unique. the dislikes for tv would be the lack of inputs and a small issue with motion picture. if you like watching tv and movies, this tv is for you

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these for our bedrooms. Great picture and excellent all around TV for the money. You cant go wrong with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Love the Size
Reviews.Author: PFer
Reviews.Content: Love the size of this TV for my bedroom, I can see it much better from my bathroom while getting ready for the day.  While scanning for channels it automatically blocked/took out channels that the cable company doesn't want you to have.  Not so sure I like that feature, I suppose I can rescan and stop it before it gets to that process.  Not sure why Samsung had to have that feature?

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Barton Traweek Dickson
Reviews.Content: the only downside would be the functionality of the controls and to change anything you have to aim to the far left corner of the tv or the remote won't work. :(

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Chad J. Barrett
Reviews.Content: Took a gamble with a refurbished TV and I'm very happy.  The picture and sound quality are perfect for having the TV in the morning and going bed.  I've owned samsung products before and am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: john kelley
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for awhile now, and have nothing but great things to say about it. It's used in the bedroom, so it's a perfect size. I used some of the other reviews to make personal adjustments and love it.

Reviews.Title: It's great because it's a Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Sarasota Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is our 4th Samsung TV - we have them all over the house.  Very easy set-up right out of the box.  Sharp, clear picture in either regular or HD mode.  Amazon prices can't be beat, and with free shipping to our door, it's a no-brainer!!

Reviews.Title: great tv......  nice size
Reviews.Author: Rod Stringwell "winstonwolf"
Reviews.Content: so far this is a great tv, lots of features, nice size for space where i have it. buy one.

Reviews.Title: Wide screen TV.
Reviews.Author: M. Harvey "Tractor junkie"
Reviews.Content: We like the TV, the only thing is that some programs are a different size on the screen.  We have to keep changing the picture size to make the best use of the screen.

Reviews.Title: Consumer Reports suggestion
Reviews.Author: dorothy e. halber
Reviews.Content: Great picture, as CR said, very easy to set up and connect. However, only one component connection. Three more words.

Reviews.Title: Sharrp as a tack..great blacks..great colors
Reviews.Author: Carl V. Thulin
Reviews.Content: I think it is as sharp as a 1080 TV. No ghosts. Good sound and it looks great in our remodeled kitchen

Reviews.Title: No Longer Available
Reviews.Author: ezfave
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect.  It seems to have been designed and made to be the very best performing no-frills set on the market.Unfortunately, it is no longer available.  They have substituted the model for one like it but that has less high quality.  The newer version has fewer amps to the speakers.  It doesn't have an illuminated remote.  I think the screen technology is slightly different in the newer version, too.I'm really glad I got this tv and  had to search the inventories of various stores to find one.  Turned out there was one at a vendor that advertises on Amazon.  Totally satisfied.I suspect the newer version is an impressive set even with a few downgrades.

Reviews.Title: Really nice TV
Reviews.Author: N. Southerland
Reviews.Content: Have bought Samsung before and was pleased, and this time was no different.  Good color, sharp picture, especially on HD.No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and sound
Reviews.Author: biker56
Reviews.Content: I'm so enjoying this TV in my room... just the right size for a medium bedroom.  The picture is beautiful and the sound very good!  Easy to assemble and set up even if you're technically challenged!

Reviews.Title: Samsung T.V.
Reviews.Author: Albert Tanner
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money and the size.  Excellent picture and decent sound.  It works for this room in every way,.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Bedroom TV!
Reviews.Author: Amesy
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with my Samsung 26" TV purchase. The picture is great, the sound is great, and I've experienced no issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Chatbuggy
Reviews.Content: Needed tv for spare room & didn't want to spend alot of money. I ended with a high quality product at an affordable price. The colors & contrast are amazing. Can't go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: TP Davenport
Reviews.Content: Very nice set.  Worked flawless out of the box.  Sounds great too.  For a bedroom, small den, or even workspace, it's very good.

Reviews.Title: nice tv.
Reviews.Author: Richard Colbert "10richierich"
Reviews.Content: no problems at all after numerous months of use.sound/volume is weak but that should be expected out of a 32" LED tv (not sure how they could possibly get powerful sounds out of something so flat.this is a very clear tv in HD.

Reviews.Title: True HDTV
Reviews.Author: Samantha Jauyoma
Reviews.Content: Very Nice What a TV set, easy to navigate very clear pictures and the sound Quality is wonderful. My TV signal was B/W when connected through my Sagem Picnic Ready TV box....Connection through HDMI and USB ports have Nice HD Color Pictures. Had to buy a HDMI converter box for my Sagem Picnic Ready Box to view TV in Color

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV
Reviews.Author: lowpost10
Reviews.Content: Hook-up was very easy (make sure you have HDMI cable). Picture and sound quality excellent. Hardest part was putting the stand together!

Reviews.Title: lovin it
Reviews.Author: not happy
Reviews.Content: this is a great LCD tv by Samsung.  the sound could be better but you can't expect truly excellent audio w/o a home theater system.  i'm very happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Very good picture and performance
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Steinman "obligate reader"
Reviews.Content: Good choice for an enclosed TV cabinet, at a very good price. Not as brilliant as our more expensive TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26 INCH HDTV is amazing!
Reviews.Author: LYDIA
Reviews.Content: We just received the TV, and set up was a snap!  Picture and color quality are crisp and rich. We installed this in our kitchen nook and are in love with how it looks. I am happy with this product would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my kids room
Reviews.Author: Robyn K.
Reviews.Content: I got this because our other TV was taking up to much space and the sound wasn't working properly.  This is a wonderful TV- it's thin, the color is beautiful and the sound is great.  I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for wife
Reviews.Author: Rick Bennett
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, she had been using a 15 inch but wasn't really watching it, just listening to it. This one she is watching and she really likes the extra features, sleep timer especially. The TV was used, but you certainly could not tell it by looking at it. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Morning News
Reviews.Author: freddy 54
Reviews.Content: Wanted a nice looking tv for  mounting on wall to catch news before work. Great picture so so sound.Mounted in kitchen looks great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN26EH4000
Reviews.Author: dave m
Reviews.Content: I was watching more in the office than on the HD big screen. I looked at the +/- 26" models and decided on this due to reviews here and elsewhere. The picture quality is excellent and sound is very good (base is weak of course). I would recommend this Samsung and am actually considering another for the deck as it is light weight and will be easy to move in and out with wireless cable (uverse).

Reviews.Title: As far as 26-Inch LED HDTVs go, there is NONE better.
Reviews.Author: Kal-El
Reviews.Content: We needed a small flat-screen TV for the living room and I intentionally chose this model because it appeared to be the best one available in its size.  I definitely believe, now, that I made the right choice.The TV itself is small, light-weight, and very simple to install.  I needed to do little more than mount the base, which comes in 2 pieces and requires 8 screws, and plug in the cable and power cords.  I didn't even bother to read the instruction manual because it just wasn't necessary.  Everything is clearly marked and self-explanatory.  The fit and finish is a beautiful black gloss that would really enhance the look of any room you put it in.  Very modern and stylish.The picture is clear, sharp, and vibrant and the sound projection is quite good.  There are many different settings to scroll through in the very easy to use on-screen menu which means you have a lot of flexibility to get this set to function to your liking.  Of particular note, the BackLight feature is very useful and makes a dramatic difference.  My living room takes in a lot of natural sunlight and I have no trouble viewing the picture.The remote controller functions very well, is no larger than it needs to be, and does everything you need it to do.I really cannot find a single flaw in the Samsung UN26EH4000. It serves its intended purpose extremely well and I would recommend it to anyone who needs an excellent 26-inch LED HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Great picture on a TV this size and for the price point.  Has been playing my DivX/Xvid and 720p MKV's right off the 1TB USB hard drive that I have plugged into the USB port all by itself, it's nice to not need 3rd party software or a player for them :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung TVs are great!
Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: Crisp, clear picture. Fits perfectly in bedroom. High quality as most Samsung products are. Highly recommend this TV.Good price, too.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my RV camper. Great picture and colors
Reviews.Author: rob "midsouth_hunter"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my RV camper. Nice TV, but a little thick for such a small TV. Was expectinhg a more slim design

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: NewEnglander
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after reading the reviews & spent a bit for for the quality. It fits perfectly under my upper kitchen cabinets.

Reviews.Title: Love it but get an HDMI cord for it!
Reviews.Author: KaylaB1984
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV! The clarity is incredible!! I hadn't had an HDMI cord plugged into it from the begginning so I was having to zoom in to get a full screen view. It wasn't ideal. It was always on widescreen mode. I plugged in an HDMI from my cable box to my TV and oh my goodness what an amazing difference!! The TV switched to full screen mode and the colors are incredible!!! The only downfall, there is no closed caption mode when it's plugged in like this so I had to call my cable company to have them help me turn on the closed captioning feature through my HD Cable Box. Anyway, this TV (while smaller than I expected) is fantastic! I'm moving this to my bedroom and getting the 32" size of this same TV for my living room. I highly recommend this and any Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: Gunnar Wells
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my bedroom and it is just right.  I have a  so it fits perfectlysmall bedroom

Reviews.Title: nice little TV
Reviews.Author: the rockstacker
Reviews.Content: I just needed something to fit an old style TV cabinet...this works well,  I have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Developed a problem quickly
Reviews.Author: circclerk
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV based upon the features and all the wonderful reviews.  I guess I'm the one that got the rare lemon as it developed a thin vertical white line in the middle of the screen less than 2 months after I bought it. I contacted Samsung support and understand that, although it is under warranty, I must pay shipping costs one way to get it repaired (or replaced).  So far, I've chosen to live with the defect.  Otherwise, it would be a nice TV, especially for a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Aussie
Reviews.Content: Love the company Samsung.This is a great tv we are very happy with the price and picture,excellent service as well.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing from the sides
Reviews.Author: T. Orlando
Reviews.Content: Picture is great from the front, but even a small distance to the side it washes out.  I was very surprised because of the great ratings Samsung gets.  My older Panasonic lcd (32in) is sharp from front all the way to extreme sides.  I expected the same from a newer TV.  I haven't used the internal tuner or other features since I have cable, so can’t comment on them.  Sound is good enough for a bedroom.  I will keep it since I am watching it mostly from the bed.  If you get up and move around the room you notice the loss of color and clarity.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26"
Reviews.Author: George D. Calage "Kropotkin"
Reviews.Content: This was a good buy considering I was constrained by a space issue.  However, I would only rate the sound and picture quality as average.  For the money, it is a good buy, but if a person can afford a higher price and has the space, I would definitely go to the upgrade versions made by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is alwayson of  the best brand
Reviews.Author: shaina eugene
Reviews.Content: I will recommend it cause this is a good choice and I am enjoying it all the time. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized
Reviews.Author: Doug Campbell
Reviews.Content: Using it in the bedroom.  Sound is a bit low, but I didn't expect any better.Good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Paul E Curtis
Reviews.Content: great buy - -  price - - right product -- right fit - - good picture quality - I love it

Reviews.Title: Great Quality Great Price
Reviews.Author: Greetings, Pilgrims
Reviews.Content: Don't hesitate. You wont find a better TV in this size. Great price.  Has all hardware to connect to other devices

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: T. Mayer
Reviews.Content: No complaints. Picture is sharp, sound is clear, and size is perfect for our bedroom.  It was easy to setup, was watching tv within 5 minutes of opening the box.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" HDTV is great
Reviews.Author: Marie C. Cimino
Reviews.Content: This is our first HDTV and we are very happy with the quality of the picture and the sound is also very good. We watch alot of black and white old movies on TCM and they look incredible. The clarity and the depth on the screen is so sharp. Even though it's a smaller screen of 26 inches it does not take away from the viewing experience.  Samsung makes a good product.

Reviews.Title: Needs time to warm up
Reviews.Author: California Girl
Reviews.Content: Love the picture, but it doesn't respond very quickly.  It takes about 30 seconds to "warm up" when turning on.  I also don't care for the way the channels change.  There's a slight delay before the next chanel appears which is not very smooth.  It's fine for the bedroom where we don't spend much time watching TV, but the lag would drive me crazy if I had to use it for my main TV because we like to flip back and forth between channels.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Elaine A. Schulte "Reader and Writer"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom but now that I have it, I realize it is too small even for the bedroom. And like its larger 32-inch companion, the sound is not clear. I won't be buying another TV any time soon, but if I were to buy one, I doubt it would be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: Jacki
Reviews.Content: We researched different brands before purchasing this TV.  The picture is sharp, the sound clear and very easy to adjust to your personal preferences.  Perfect TV for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Joan Senn
Reviews.Content: This TV was easy to set up and is working fine. The real test of quality will be in how long it lasts.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Andres Lezama
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv even when it is used it works great I don't know why people don't like the audio when it has a great one you just have to play around with the picture is also great which you also have to adjust those settings the tv stand I must admit is cheap and a little flimsy but it'll do I got the 26 inch version and am very content with it I would recommend this product to anyone if you want a quality tv that's cheap then this is the right one to buy Samsung still has some great tvs out there

Reviews.Title: FUZZY SPOTS
Reviews.Author: Melanie Tunnell
Reviews.Content: there is a fuzzy area in the center of the picture on all channels.  For the price it's an OK TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent experience
Reviews.Author: Houyhnhnm
Reviews.Content: When I ordered a scratch-and-dent model through Amazon's warehouse, I held my breath a bit, but I felt reassured by the 30 day return option. Happily, I didn't need to use that. Upon inspecting the TV, I found only one tiny color irregularity on the black frame. From the Amazon writer-up, I was expecting deep scratches, something glaringly noticeable. Plus, the TV works beautifully, crisp picture, easy remote. Best of all, I saved several hundred dollars. Can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect size for the perfect spot.  It was easy to set up and it works great and has a very good picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: ChelC
Reviews.Content: Spot on color and visual! this tv is small but very vivid and defined, that's why i decided to spend a little more this tv was supposed to have great picture and it delivered. it looks good from all angles too! the contrast stays the same. very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Samsung makes great TVs
Reviews.Author: JLC
Reviews.Content: We had  3 Samsung TVs before buying this one, so we knew they are great quality.  This one is a nice size for a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Samsung did it again.
Reviews.Author: Terry Whaley
Reviews.Content: For a 26 inch TV this is a superb product.  Fits the opening that I have and the sound is very excellent.

Reviews.Title: Picture is good.  Used it for a trade show display
Reviews.Author: Dave & Joy
Reviews.Content: Had a looping video running.  Only annoying part was that you could not set a default looping video.  Had to change the setting everytime the TV was turned on.  Also, upon completion of the video the menu description of the video flashed on the screen for about 15 seconds.  Image was clear even under the bright lights of the trade show.

Reviews.Title: Great picture; easy to hook-up; love the usb input
Reviews.Author: Sandy Lynn Stevens
Reviews.Content: Can't believe how fast this came! Very pleased with this purchase. Bought it for our kitchen counter and probably could have used the 32" but this works out fine.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: bv@amzn
Reviews.Content: The picture is perfect, but it does not swivel vertically or horizontally. I have impression it is designed to be placed on a wall and not set on a countertop. There are no customary controls. Just a sort of a joystick, which I'm yet to master. In the meantime I only use remote. Other than that it works great.

Reviews.Title: George in  Colorado
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Out with old and in with the new. Been using Samsung for a long time. Have a 46 inch one in the TV room and this one in the living room . Both have good pictures. The sound button is a little slow

Reviews.Title: LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: William R. Sistler "EOD"
Reviews.Content: Nice TV.  Perfect size for the guest room.  Works like a champ.  Want to smarten it up?  My an apple tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Jim Huston
Reviews.Content: We are using this TV in the kitchen/eating area. Works very well. All our TVs are Samsung. They have the best picture.

Reviews.Title: I like this new TV!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Kincaid
Reviews.Content: It's lighweight and easy to move around. Great picture quality.Don't like........It takes a long time (Lots of repeated button-pushing) to get the volume higher or lower.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my old "tube". Good choice.
Reviews.Author: R. Gray
Reviews.Content: Reviews I'd read indicated good sound. True. Another reviewer listed the adjustments he'd made. I printed that out, and got my grandson to make all the adjustments necessary to make it to my liking.  I especially like that it is lightweight. I can turn it, pick it up if I ever need to. without looking for some muscle to move it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: AliCat
Reviews.Content: I compared various TVs and decided to buy this one (Samsung 26" LED HDTV) based on features and reviews.  It is great!  Really bright, clear, colorful picture quality and excellent sound.  I have it in my bedroom and have a ROKU HD streaming player connected.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Charles Graf
Reviews.Content: This TV is all that I expected. The only disappointment is the volumn is very low. It arrived on time and in expected condition.

Reviews.Title: Great Value.
Reviews.Author: Dean J. Pasquale
Reviews.Content: Samsung delivers a great picture, great tuner, and an intuitive remote.  The entire package doesn't require much manual referencing.  The reviews were true.  I love the fact that picture aspect settings don't carry over to different channels and you can choose what you want for each.  The remote control could always illuminate itself a little longer especially since it's used in a bedroom, but it is sized right and easy to use.  You will appreciate this HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: bake
Reviews.Content: Fine set.  Pluged it in and away we go.  I think LED does give a better picture and would pay a small premium to get it

Reviews.Title: great for the money
Reviews.Author: Catherine O'Rourke
Reviews.Content: Very nice.  Easy to set up...so easy my two boys did it for me.  Very clear picture.Nice size for the money.

Reviews.Title: I'd buy another!
Reviews.Author: Smutty
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my bedroom.  Great TV for the money.  Light as a feather so heavy duty wall mount not needed.  Would make a great computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Our new 26 inch Samsung
Reviews.Author: MJO
Reviews.Content: Enjoy this TV for our spare bedroom.  Grandchildren love it, too.  Thank you,Yes, we would recommend it for anyone needing a spare TV.

Reviews.Title: 720p is fine in this size..  the 60hz matters
Reviews.Author: charles e. rudy
Reviews.Content: TV works as advertised.  Very sharp picture with good color.  Set up was easy and it makes a cool sound when you turn it on...

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: R. Hull "sci-fi fan"
Reviews.Content: Wanted to take advantage of the time of year with heavy discounts on tv's so decided to replace a 26 inch CRT set (about 15 years old but still looked great!) with the slimmer flat screen and the 16x9 screen ratio.  We do not have HD so can not comment on that nor do we use this with a computer or network, so again, no comment.  It's just a TV for us and we have it in the bedroom and it is all that Samsung always is....perfect picture, plenty of volume, easy controls, quick setup, and fantastic color.  Wish it had a tilting stand as it surprised us that it leans backwards when mounted.  Unless you have this on a low table, that is the wrong direction.  Double checked the instructions, it appears I did it properly.  As this sits up higher than the floor, ended up tipping it forward with a block of wood.  We have cable with a cable box and connecting was no fuss.  Finding the proper code for cable box to TV was quick and easy on the internet.  No problems and recommend this set for those with a smaller space.  A side note: I was curious if the picture height (when not in letter box comfig) would match the old 26 CRT screen at about 12 inches high and it does.  The CRT set has a new life in my wifes sewing room so nothing went to the land fill.  Another little hint, if you use the 120vac outlet on the back of a comcast cable box, the tv may not turn on when you press the all-on button.  The tv powers up to a standby mode but does not turn on.  On older boxes you could set the operation of the outlet and correct this but newer boxes you can not.  The only cure is to plug the tv in to a hot outlet so it is in standby all the time.  Using the cable remote when then turn box and tv on together.

Reviews.Title: HDTV
Reviews.Author: T. Hanson
Reviews.Content: We had been shopping for a replacement TV for our bedroom, it was hard to find one with a 26" screen.We have had good luck with Samsung Electronics in the past, the price was right  & had options we were looking  for. Great TV.Dave

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Francine S Toback
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound quality... Very happy with my purchase. I would recommend Samsung to anyone looking for a smallerTV with quality.

Reviews.Title: Great extra TV
Reviews.Author: L. Large "Lou Lou"
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived in perfect condition and in a timely manor.  I plugged  it in with my cable, ran the auto program and it was ready to use.  The picture is great.  I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality, good sound
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv after converting my (grown) son's room to an office. It meets my needs perfectly. I'm not that picky, but both the picture and sound quality are very good.  I like that it's LED and saves a little energy. I use the cable company's remote rather than the Samsung one, so I can't comment on that. It was a good price, too.

Reviews.Title: UN32EH4000
Reviews.Author: Szott
Reviews.Content: It's a great little TV.  It was free as an incentive with my larger TV purchase.  Replaced a 27" tube TV in a spare bedroom.  The kids use it to watch their...kid movies.  Perfect for that.  Nice picture.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: This TV is great and works great. I can easily watch videos from my computer, digital camera, etc with the HDMI connection. I would recommend this product to anyone who is interested. Samsung is a great brand and this TV is of the best quality.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat
Reviews.Author: hike sedona "hikesedona"
Reviews.Content: We've always had good luck with  Sony and Panasonic.  This is our second Samsung and they are  in that same class of excellent televisions.

Reviews.Title: Our old tv needed replacement....
Reviews.Author: From Scotland
Reviews.Content: and this did the job perfectly.  It fits my space precisley.  What more can I say - it's a tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Cara
Reviews.Content: Really nice little tv... just make sure you use a HDMI cable. And it has a audio outlet which I really needed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Escape2Books
Reviews.Content: We have had no problems with this tv.  It is just the right size for our small bedroom.  Great picture.

Reviews.Title: Reasonably priced, good picture and sound
Reviews.Author: J.B. "Gee"
Reviews.Content: The husband did the research on this so he deserves the credit for finding it for us--still it is a good little TV for our small bedroom. And the sound is remarkably crisp (not tinny) for a small television--much better than our old-school tube telly was putting out, that's for sure. Easy as pie to set up, no complaints. Except perhaps it's yet another reason to not want to get out of bed...

Reviews.Title: Lg tv
Reviews.Author: Jilly
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the bedroom. It is light so is easy to move when dusting and it was very easy to set it up. I am picky about color on televisions but I didn't even have to make an adjustment.

Reviews.Title: Great Kitchen TV.
Reviews.Author: D. Cooper
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend's dad because I am the world's greatest boyfriend.  The picture is exceptional, sound's good.  He can watch sports in the kitchen and can see the scores now.

Reviews.Title: First LED, much much nicer than LCD's
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Best TV at a very fair price, its my first LED tv, there is a significant difference to an LCD, it just seems clearer, crisper. nicer. Wont go back to LCD's

Reviews.Title: Okay TV.
Reviews.Author: JimC
Reviews.Content: I'm more of a Plasma TV guy, but this is a good tv for those smaller areas.  You have to sit in front of it.  Not clear from the side.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Craig
Reviews.Content: Love LED technology. Samsung offers many nice features so TV is comparable with multiple devices. Very slender and frame is minimal.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality with Enhancement
Reviews.Author: John in Alex "John"
Reviews.Content: This TV is for my office and the size was determined by the bookcase it went into.  The set up was very fast and simple as it did almost everything though the Plug and Play.  The picture quality is very good.  I have it hooked into a FIOS cable box, not the high definition one, but being smaller size it seems to have a very good picture.  Like most smaller flat panel TVs, the sound is not the best.  It is acceptable for most TV viewing, but weak on music channels.  Therefore, I bought the Bose Solo TV Sound System which the TV sits on.  Now my sound is better than great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price for a LED 32"
Reviews.Author: T. Tran "TAT"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for a dorm room or a bedroom TV. Very lite, easy set up, excellent colors if patiently tweaked! Speaker sound is just OK as expected. LED TVs are very energy efficient.My son always leaves his old TV on all the time in his room, so with this LED TV we do not have to threaten him anymore about cutting down his allowances!

Reviews.Title: Great TV Yay Samsung!
Reviews.Author: SamsungTV
Reviews.Content: Totally Satisfied with this TV. If you like to download video file and watch it with TV, You dont have to connect your computer to TV with HDMI. At least With this TV.USB port on this TV, reads video files as well, not like other Samsung or LG Tv.YAY

Reviews.Title: Sold on Samsung
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Lowell "Formerly Famous"
Reviews.Content: Having finally made the jump to a flat screen, I am repeatedly impressed by Samsung. This 720 p resolution model is just what I wanted for the bedroom, and fits nicely in a shelf-unit I built. The sound quality is a little weak, but I usually run it through an amplifier and better speaker system if I am really wanting to enjoy programming. The price was just right, and the picture is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Coshoctonian
Reviews.Content: I bought this 26" Samsung LED TV for use in a bedroom.  It arrived quickly and in good condition. It is the perfect size for my need.  I plan to mount it on the wall, but for now it sits on top of a dresser and is a good view from the bed.  The sound and picture are excellent. The remote control is easy to use and includes a "sleep" button, which is so handy, as you don't need to get up or even try to remember to shut off the TV before you go to sleep! The on-screen menu is not too difficult to use to adjust anything, if needed, once you explore the possibilities.  I have not tried to use any other units (such as a DVD player) with it yet, but once you connect it and choose the source from the remote, it shouldn't be difficult.  I am really pleased with this TV and would recommend it...a great TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We bought this Samsung UN32EH4000 32" for a bedroom.  The size is perfect. The picture quality and sound are good.  Other reviews indicated that the stand was not very sturdy or adjustable.  I would agree that the stand could be of a higher quality but it is working for us.  We're glad we made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good tv.
Reviews.Author: Roberta Williamson
Reviews.Content: This Samsung TV met my expectations.  It was ready to use out of the box.  I am not strong, but was able to lift the box and the tv by myself.  The stand was easy to put together and use.  The picture is good, the sound is good, the remote easy to use, and the automatic channel setup quick.  I am glad I purchased this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Earth Two John
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent television. I ordered it primarily to watch DVDs and play XBOX 360, I don't have it connected to cable nor do I watch regular television. Picture quality is good, the TV is light weight, and it sounds great. The remote is also easy to use. I assembled the TV in less than 5 minutes (you have to attach the stand). It's very simple to use. At 32 inches, it is the perfect size for my small living room. I also really like the USB port, very useful!

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: sutter67
Reviews.Content: So far it has been a great tv great sound great picture quality. Easy to set up and hook up to everything.

Reviews.Title: Very Affordable yet Excellent Picture!
Reviews.Author: John D. Wise
Reviews.Content: This TV was a perfect choice for a wall mounted guest room TV.  Amazon had everything I needed to select the TV, a great Wall Mount and a Power Bridge such that the electrical wires don't show.  The TV features are just right for our intended use, in that we don't require Full 1080P and need no HDMI (although the TV has two).  The TV screen is gorgeous with a very small piano black frame.  The Video-Sonic Wall Mount fit perfect and was easy to install with just two screws directly into a wall stud.  The Power Bridge is a very creative way to bring power to the wall, without even needing to shut off your electric.  It is actually a behind the wall extension cord and gets its power from the surge protector which in turn is plugged to a wall outlet nearby.  Wonderful way to get power easily.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Review
Reviews.Author: George M. Parch
Reviews.Content: A pretty good bang for the buck; but don't expect the same picture quality as a plasma. Primary use for this TV is the bedroom; no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Awesome T.V.!
Reviews.Author: Matticus
Reviews.Content: Great t.v.! Hasn't let me down yet! I have direct t.v. so the quality isn't that great because it doesn't have a variety of HD channels. I also play video games and it works superb! But I you MUST have a HDMI cable if you're going to game on this t.v.!Quality 4/5!Sound 5/5!

Reviews.Title: Broke 3 weeks after purchase
Reviews.Author: Jenae Kopecky
Reviews.Content: I had it for about 3 weeks and it just stopped working.  It turned off while watching it and will not turn back on.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: DL
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32" tv to replace my 20 CRT Sony which still works pretty good but since the games have change so the resolution.at first I was gonna get a Sony 2012 32 but they didn't make led of this size this year the picture in the Sony is really, good design nice features the sound is bad just like all thin tvs on the market they thin so they cant have good sound i just need to hook it up to a spund bar or surround sound but its not and led that's why I went with samsung this time the tv is a LCD with led backlit the sound it's really loud you won't need a sound bar or anything else the picture is amazing the colors are more bright and uses less energy for playing videogames is good 720 60 h but it looks like 1080p so you can't tell diference on this size really happy with this tv ohh I forgot it actually doesnt have control on the side of the tv it has a joystick so maybe some reject the tv because that little flaw design but I don't mind I use the ps3 media remote to control tv and ps3

Reviews.Title: Great Small LED! Can't complain because it was free with a promotion
Reviews.Author: Anthony5362
Reviews.Content: I received this 32" TV for free as a package deal when I bought the UN65ES8000 model. I didn't need another TV as all my rooms now have TV's, but when I set it up, I couldn't believe the amazing picture. The picture looks almost just as good as my 46" ES8000. It has excellent black levels, and colors. No backlight bleeding in the corners, or bottom.The picture is so good, that I ended up hanging it in my Master bathroom and took the 37" down. I'm really shocked to see this on such a low end model. I guess because this TV uses Direct Lit and not Edge lit like most LED's use these days. Yes, it is kinda thick but not too thick, but I don't see the thickness anyway the way I have it set up.  Some people have mentioned that there is no way to hook up audio, but that isn't true as there is an Optical output in the back.I highly recommend this TV if your'e looking for a TV for your bathroom or just looking for an amazing affordable, small LED that has an excellent Picture!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32" tv to replace my 20 CRT Sony which still works pretty good but since the games have change so the resolution.at first I was gonna get a Sony 2012 32 but they didn't make led of this size this year the picture in the Sony is really, good design nice features the sound is bad just like all thin tvs on the market they thin so they cant have good sound i just need to hook it up to a spund bar or surround sound but its not and led that's why I went with samsung this time the tv is a LCD with led backlit the sound it's really loud you won't need a sound bar or anything else the picture is amazing the colors are more bright and uses less energy for playing videogames is good 720 60 h but it looks like 1080p so you can't tell diference on this size really happy with this tv ohh I forgot it actually doesnt have control on the side of the tv it has a joystick so maybe some reject the tv because that little flaw design but I don't mind I use the ps3 media remote to control tv and ps3

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV for the price I spend
Reviews.Author: Ayan
Reviews.Content: This is a very Good LED TV for the price I spend $350.It has 2 HDMI in, 1 USB input, AVI inputIt can play wide variety of videos like flv, mkv and other formats(more than I expected).It accepts external portable dard drive as well with maximum 4 logical partitions(more than I expected).I am basically from Asian Country, and its input voltage range is 120V, and so it needs adapter to play in India.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV's are the best
Reviews.Author: F. Diaz
Reviews.Content: Samsung certianly produces crisp technology and a must for anyone who wants to see clear and crisp moives, games, etc.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Leonard orzechowski
Reviews.Content: First time ordering a TV online. I am very pleasantly surprised. Delivered to my home with in 1wk. No hassle dealing with a sales person or worrying about how am I'm going to get this in my car. Oh by the way the TV IS AWESOME better picture than my one in my living room. Perfect size for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: it's good！
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: It's good!Amazing~ it's big enough for my bedroom and worth to buy it˜ I like samsung so much, and it also has the reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: brothergriz
Reviews.Content: Nice little TV. Good quality feel and offers a few surprises. One I found interesting was the backliting for the remote, had the unit for a couple weeks before I found that feature. Wonder what else I'll find in time. Thanks Samsung.

Reviews.Title: TV for my father-in-law
Reviews.Author: Kurt W Eisele PhD
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my father-in-law to use in his assisted living facility since he loves to watch the NY Yankees.

Reviews.Title: A solid choice
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Pizagno
Reviews.Content: Exactly the right TV for a bedroom ( or bathroom ). Great picture. Only complaint is the slow way the remote changes volume. You can't just hold down the button and expect volume changes. You must keep pushing etc. Maybe I am doing something wrong ?

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I like the tv I sent it back just to get a bigger tv..great tv tho....great picture. Good price...highly recommended tv

Reviews.Title: LED TV
Reviews.Author: Pammers
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound quality.  I still haven't figured out the various features but will in time.  Need to contact my cable company as I can't get a picture with the controls.

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: Jackie Archer
Reviews.Content: They are in guest quarters so I haven't used them enough to rate .....but so far, so good.  ...No complaints from guests.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Laurie Blum
Reviews.Content: It works great but there are only 2 hookups for extra devices.  We have alot of gaming equipment plus dvd player and cable to hookup, However we had or cable guy come and set it all up for us he did it for free, but some might not.

Reviews.Title: The best product I never got
Reviews.Author: Alan Ebi
Reviews.Content: The seller substituted UN32EH4003 for this product. The one sent was a later model and did not have good reviews. There was a mention that it was a rebranded product. By the time I got return authorization the product was no longer available and I went with my second choice, a Vizio Wi-Fi 32 inch. As I write my Wi-Fi went out but I was able to hook it up by ethernet and go on with my Netflix movie.

Reviews.Title: It's nice
Reviews.Author: Ha Le "hamongle"
Reviews.Content: Get it free when I bought the 46'. I gave it to my daughter and she love it. It's perfect for her room.

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery and setup to a point. This unit went into my MH replacing a practically unused 14 month old LG which died. My biggest time user was when I went to plug in the headphone plug into a receiver. Big time search. Even after 45 minutes on the phone with Samsung tech support, no joy. Just about every electronic gadget I've had it's obvious, without thinking, where the plug goes! Not this unit. Finally in a very nondescript hole I saw what looked like some contacts! BINGO. Too much time wasted on such a simple thing. I happen to use the output into a PC speaker system and both TV and PCspeakers are each able to have volume controlled separately which is a big plus as opposed to having one or the other as some of the sets I have. Other features are VG so far for my useage, still exploring.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 26" TV
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes high quality TV.I know because I own 5 Samsung TV's.A couple of them are over 10 years old with no problems.UPS finally delivered the TV on the second try.They refused to open my gate and set the TV inside.I called UPS customer service and they wanted me todrive 30 miles to their center to pick it up.I will never use UPS service again.

Reviews.Title: Best 32' inch LED TV at this Price Point... Period!
Reviews.Author: Team Radbery
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on this set is fantastic. One of the few if not the only set, with a 3,000,000 to 1 contrast ratio. It helps make your blacks - blacker and whites - whiter. The colors are so vividly rich. I couldn't believe my eyes, when I had this set first turned on. You won't be disappointed in this TV whatsoever. The menus are attractive and very easy to navigate as well. It has a 20 total watt virtual surround sound speaker system, built into the TV. You can change it to standard, music, or movie modes. The music mode is amazing when listening to TV shows or concerts with music or singing. When you are watching a DVD, the explosive scenes in movie mode sucks you right into the action. I can't say enough, how much you get for this ridiculous price point.The only negative is the remote control could have been Universal to work other devices, as well as the TV. But who am I to complain. Everything else about this set is sensational!

Reviews.Title: Very bad TV for playing video games
Reviews.Author: Mr. Smith
Reviews.Content: The picture is good for movies and has good sound quality, but the picture is terrible when playing PS3 games. It has motion blur, and lines get an annoying flickering. It literally gave me an extremely bad headache that lasted all day. This is the last time I am getting an HDTV. I am switching back to my old SD CRTV and am staying that way until they make better HDTVs.

Reviews.Title: Adequate for an extra TV
Reviews.Author: Middletown USA
Reviews.Content: Size was perfect for us, however picture quality, and color are only adequate. Would be okay for viewing as a tertiary hook up.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: breakfastchef
Reviews.Content: This TV has lots of great features including a variety of digital and analog inputs a fairly well laid out remote. But, the picture quality is awful. I got this as a gift for the holidays as a bedroom TV for my wife. We both agreed by the next day that this has to be returned.

Reviews.Title: product voltage
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: There was no indication that the voltage required was 110v . i did not appreciate that the TV was being shipped from America and had to spend £20+ to buy a transformed and another scarp lead. The TV is excellent but I was upset by the lack of a warning. I now know that Amazon.com is an american company

Reviews.Title: Caption problem
Reviews.Author: Norman Richards
Reviews.Content: I bought the set because  the owner's manual indicated that the size and coloring of the captions could be changed if one were receiving a digital signal.  Not so !  Comcast delivers a digital signal but it has to be a SPECIFIC digital signal before one can change the size and color of the captions.  Comcast indicates that it has not refined thier digital signal in my area to the extent needed.  How is a purchaser supposted to know this??  A WASTE OF MONEY.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: SGBaker "sgb22741"
Reviews.Content: Received the item and once the shipment was unloaded from the box it was evident that it was unusable to me.  The hardware to attach the monitor to the Base was missing along with the screws.  So I returned it to Amazon for a refund.  Amazon is one of the best sources for electronics and I hated to return it but needed a TV so I sent it back.  Amazon credited my account.

Reviews.Title: Extreme ghosting issues - do not buy for gaming.
Reviews.Author: Alexander Leech
Reviews.Content: I purchased this display primarily for my 360 and ps3, I was hoping Samsung's notorious ghosting issue was not present in this panel, as it was with the two panels I owned prior to this one (both by Samsung, thankfully, I did not purchase either them). Simply by hooking this display up to a PC and running the ghosting tests in PixPerAn immediately shows the ghosting issues with dark colors - primarily blacks and grays. This is present on any content, regardless of the framerate - 24, 30, 60, or 100+ - the ghosting is present and makes most games essentially unplayable, since most the scene smears half way across the screen when you move the camera around in-game.Yes, I made sure game mode was on and all the other settings were calibrated for gaming purposes, none of which had any effect what so ever on the black ghosting. Honestly, I could not recommend this monitor to anyone for any reason, since you will be hard pressed to view much media completely devoid of blacks and grays, it is quite humorous how this television is so highly rated, I challenge anyone to run the PixPerAn tests, it is not a faulty panel, they are all like this.This is not just present in games either, it also affects general TV use and watching movies, trying to watch The Dark Knight is akin to viewing water colors on canvas.

Reviews.Title: PIXEL PROBLEMS IN 90 DAYS OR LESS.........
Reviews.Author: Ms. Margaret V. Meek
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED 9/2012.  DECEMBER 2012 SCREEN MIDDLE PIXELS DIED.  PAYMENT ACCEPTED IMMEDIATELY, HOWEVER - CUSTOMER SERVICE GIVEN - NOT SO MUCH. AFTER SEVERAL HOURS ON 3 SEPARATE "CHATS" WITH SAMSUNG, I WAS GIVEN A REFERENCE NUMBER - BUT NO INSTRUCTION AS HOW I WAS TO USE IT.  INFORMED AN EMAIL WOULD COME.  NO EMAIL CAME,  I CALLED JANUARY 03, 2012.  THE EMAIL WAS THEN SENT,, WITH NO EXPLANATION AS TO WHAT I WAS SUPPOSED TO DO.  I WILL NOW HAVE TO TAKE THE TV TO A UPS DROP OFF CENTER AND ROLL THE DICE.  MEANTIME, I HAVE NO TELEVISION, AND NO ONE KNOWS WHEN/IF I WILL HAVE A TV AGAIN.  I WENT ONLINE AND FOUND MANY, MANY, MANY COMPLAINTS ABOUT THIS PIXEL PROBLEM WITH THE SAMSUNG TELEVISIONS.  ALL SIZES, ALL MODELS.  BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: Samsung gets my vote
Reviews.Author: BessieBeagle
Reviews.Content: During the past 3 years, I have been purchasing only Samsung products, including a recent TV I purchased through Amazon which arrived on time, well packaged and I love it.  It may have cost me a little more than other brands for the small size I chose but it is a great TV. Speaking of Samsung, I purchased a two-door Samsung fridge(I had not known Samsung made kitchen appliances until I was in the market for the fridge)which I absolutely love.  The price of it was half of most comparable brands, the design is not only better but I am very happy with its functionability and it looks grand in my new kitchen. Samsung gets my vote until it beginsmessing up.  Let's hope not. So far so great.

Reviews.Title: How to connect speakers
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I need to know how to connect speakers to this tv. Good deal for the tv but want more sound !!!

Reviews.Title: no  normal external on off, chanel, volume up down buttons on tv
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This TV sounded good to me so I went to look at it at Best Buy.  No batteries in the remote, so I tried to increase volume, and change channels on the TV itself.  there were no buttons (or touch screen on the TV for this)on the TV itself.  on the bottom there was one joystick button for going through the menu, but that was it.  I was sadly disappointed.  If your batteries die in your remote, no TV.Please read comment to the post.  Joystick changes channels, etc.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: lgatos
Reviews.Content: This bracket was simple and pretty straightforward to use.  It is simply for mounting the TV to the wall and not for being able to swing the TV in different directions.  If this is all you need, it does the job and for a great price.  I used it on a 32" Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Missing accessories
Reviews.Author: Longears "Mule Breath"
Reviews.Content: Not Amazon't fault, but the television arrived without all of the accessories. There was no remote control, power cord, owner guide and half of the stand was missing as well.

Reviews.Title: Product was not as described
Reviews.Author: Tony Gurowski
Reviews.Content: The item received was without speakers or TV channels. It was simply a monitor not a TV. The worst of it all was it cost me $120 to return the item at my expense when the problem was caused by the Company.

Reviews.Title: NOT an LED but an LCD
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Chismar "RobC"
Reviews.Content: This TV is listed as an LED but it is an LCD that is backlit with old florescent tubes not LED's thus it is much thicker. There is no such TV as an LED tv! There are only 2 types of TV's - Plasma and LCD PERIOD. LED stands for Light Emitting Diode which is used for backlighting an LCD tv. Plasmas need NO backlight. LCD tv's started out with large flouresecent tube lights but now all are backlit via small LED's. Some LCD tv's are full LED and some are side lit with LED's thus cheaper. Both are slim in design.

Reviews.Title: not what I thought
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: The TV you say is a LED but is just a LCD is so Wide, I not happy I thinking I need more information.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Cohen
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought a Samsung television 2 years ago. A few weeks ago the picture started flashing like a strobe light. We looked it up on the internet and saw that many many customers were having the same problem. I called the repair service and scheduled a repair. The service person told me he has to fix this all the time on Samsung televisions. The flashing is due to a mistake in the wiring system which Samsung is fully aware of!Unfortunately, because the problem didn't occur until AFTER my warranty had expired, I would have to pay about $200 for the repair. The repair person suggested calling Samsung Executive Customer Relations to see if they would cover the repair since it is a product that has a KNOWN failure and nothing that was my fault. Also, it was nothing I could have known about when I bought the television.  I called and after many empty apologies on their part, they refused to help us out with our repair expenses because we were a year out of warranty.  Nothing could change their minds.This was a terrible experience for us and one that I wouldn't want anyone else to have.  A company that sells products with faulty wiring or any other KNOWN problem - and then refuses to cover the repair expense - is not a company that I would do business with again.  Neither should you.  Keep my experience in mind before you buy a Samsung television.

Reviews.Title: NEVER BUY SAMSUNG AGAIN!!
Reviews.Author: LLN
Reviews.Content: I bought a Samsung tv in 2008 for over $3,000 which has since become a paper weight because Samsung REFUSES to support it product. It has taken a class action law suit to receive any customer service from this company and the lawsuit was so narrow that it missed an additional issue that thousands of the affected tv's were beset with: faulty mainboards. This company is terrible and should be shut out of the US market for selling junk. DO NOT BUY THEIR PRODUCTS!!

Reviews.Title: Never Again
Reviews.Author: Clare T.
Reviews.Content: Samsung always had a good name and rating.  I had Amazon points and wanted to get a larger t.v. for my beach house.  Ordered it (new) a month ago.  Came right on time.  Two weeks ago brought it to the beach set it up and loved it!  Two days ago used it for the first time. I was so happy with my purchase.  Yesterday  didn't turn the t.v. on until I fixed lunch and sat down to watch the ball game. NOTHING! a faint click, but no picture, no sound...... NOTHING but that faint click.  Called service number and this morning I'm traveling 30 miles to drop it off to be repaired.  Never again.  [[ASIN:B0073WAK9Y Samsung UN26EH4000 26-Inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV (Black)]

Reviews.Title: Dead TV in 3 years
Reviews.Author: J. Lentini "JL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about 3 years ago. It was about 600 bucks back then. Worked fine at first. Yesterday I tried to watch my TV and it won't turn on. The red light just stares at me, mocking me. I looked it up, and it turns out there is a power fault in these TVs. I called customer service and all they did was set up an appointment with a local TV repair man, that will cost me 89.00 bucks just to look at the thing. I think I was ripped off. If its a known fault they should fix it free of charge. I'm probably better off buying a whole new set, from a different company.
